2861  ITERATE(q, nclist) {
2862  Object* obj = OBJ(q);
2863  NetCon* d = (NetCon*)obj->u.this_pointer;
2864  if (d->target_) {
2865  int type = d->target_->prop->type;
2866  if (pnt_receive_init[type]) {
2867 (*pnt_receive_init[type])(d->target_, d->weight_, 0);
2868  }else{
2869  //not the first
2870  for (j = d->cnt_-1; j > 0; --j) {
2871  d->weight_[j] = 0.;
2872  }
2873  }
2874  }
2875  }
2876  if (gcv_) {
2877  for (int j=0; j < nrn_nthread; ++j) {
2878  if (gcv_->ctd_[j].watch_list_) {
2879  gcv_->ctd_[j].watch_list_->RemoveAll();
2880  }
2881  }
2882  }else{
2883  for (int j=0; j < nrn_nthread; ++j) {
2884  NetCvodeThreadData& d = p[j];
2885  for (i = 0; i < d.nlcv_; ++i) {
2886  if (d.lcv_[i].ctd_[0].watch_list_) {
2887  d.lcv_[i].ctd_[0].watch_list_->RemoveAll();
2888  }
2889  }
2890  }
2891  }
2892 }
2893 
2894 double PreSyn::mindelay() {
2895  double md = 1e9;
2896  int i;
2897  for (i=dil_.count()-1; i >= 0; --i) {
2898  NetCon* d = dil_.item(i);
2899  if (md > d->delay_) {
2900  md = d->delay_;
2901  }
2902  }
2903  return md;
2904 }
2905 
2906 void NetCvode::deliver_events(double til, NrnThread* nt) {
2907 //printf("deliver_events til %20.15g\n", til);
2908  p[nt->id].enqueue(this, nt);
2909  while(deliver_event(til, nt)) {
2910  ;
2911  }
2912 }
2913 
2914 static IvocVect* peqvec; //if not nil then the sorted times on the event queue.
2915 static void peq(const TQItem*, int);
2916 static void peq(const TQItem* q, int) {
2917  if (peqvec) {
2918  int n = peqvec->capacity();
2919  peqvec->resize_chunk(n+1);
2920  peqvec->elem(n) = q->t_;
2921  }else{
2922  DiscreteEvent* d = (DiscreteEvent*)q->data_;
2923  d->pr("", q->t_, net_cvode_instance);
2924  }
2925 }
2926 
2927 void NetCvode::print_event_queue() {
2928  // dangerous since many events can go out of existence after
2929  // a simulation and before NetCvode::clear at the next initialization
2930  if (ifarg(1)) {
2931  peqvec = vector_arg(1);
2932  peqvec->resize(0);
2933  }
2934  p[0].tqe_->forall_callback(peq);
2935  peqvec = nil;
2936 }
2937 
2938 static int event_info_type_;
2939 static IvocVect* event_info_tvec_;
2940 static IvocVect* event_info_flagvec_;
2941 static OcList* event_info_list_; // netcon or point_process
2942 
2943 static void event_info_callback(const TQItem*, int);
2944 static void event_info_callback(const TQItem* q, int) {
2945  DiscreteEvent* d = (DiscreteEvent*)q->data_;
2946  NetCon* nc;
2947  PreSyn* ps;
2948  SelfEvent* se;
2949  int n = event_info_tvec_->capacity();
2950  switch(d->type()) {
2951  case NetConType:
2952  if (event_info_type_ == NetConType) {
2953  nc = (NetCon*)d;
2954  event_info_tvec_->resize_chunk(n+1);
2955  event_info_tvec_->elem(n) = q->t_;
2956  event_info_list_->append(nc->obj_);
2957  }
2958  break;
2959  case SelfEventType:
2960  if (event_info_type_ == SelfEventType) {
2961  se = (SelfEvent*)d;
2962  event_info_tvec_->resize_chunk(n+1);
2963  event_info_tvec_->elem(n) = q->t_;
2964  event_info_flagvec_->resize_chunk(n+1);
2965  event_info_flagvec_->elem(n) = se->flag_;
2966  event_info_list_->append(se->target_->ob);
2967  }
2968  break;
2969  case PreSynType:
2970  if (event_info_type_ == NetConType) {
2971  ps = (PreSyn*)d;
2972  for (int i = ps->dil_.count()-1; i >= 0; --i) {
2973  nc = ps->dil_.item(i);
2974  double td = nc->delay_ - ps->delay_;
2975  event_info_tvec_->resize_chunk(n+1);
2976  event_info_tvec_->elem(n) = q->t_ + td;
2977  event_info_list_->append(nc->obj_);
2978  ++n;
2979  }
2980  }
2981  break;
2982  }
2983 }
2984 
2985 void NetCvode::event_queue_info() {
2986  // dangerous since many events can go out of existence after
2987  // a simulation and before NetCvode::clear at the next initialization
2988  int i = 1;
2989  event_info_type_ = (int)chkarg(i++, 2, 3);
2990  event_info_tvec_ = vector_arg(i++);
2991  event_info_tvec_->resize(0);
2992  if (event_info_type_ == SelfEventType) {
2993  event_info_flagvec_ = vector_arg(i++);
2994  event_info_flagvec_->resize(0);
2995  }
2996  Object* o = *hoc_objgetarg(i++);
2997  check_obj_type(o, "List");
2998  event_info_list_ = (OcList*)o->u.this_pointer;
2999  event_info_list_->remove_all();
3000  p[0].tqe_->forall_callback(event_info_callback);
3001 }
3002 
3003 void DiscreteEvent::send(double tt, NetCvode* ns, NrnThread* nt) {
3004  STATISTICS(discretevent_send_);
3005  ns->event(tt, this, nt);
3006 }
3007 
3008 void DiscreteEvent::deliver(double tt, NetCvode* ns, NrnThread* nt) {
3009  STATISTICS(discretevent_deliver_);
3010 }
3011 
3012 NrnThread* DiscreteEvent::thread() { return nrn_threads; }
3013 
3014 void DiscreteEvent::pgvts_deliver(double tt, NetCvode* ns) {
3015  STATISTICS(discretevent_deliver_);
3016 }
3017 
3018 void DiscreteEvent::pr(const char* s, double tt, NetCvode* ns) {
3019  Printf("%s DiscreteEvent %.15g\n", s, tt);
3020 }
3021 
3022 void NetCon::send(double tt, NetCvode* ns, NrnThread* nt) {
3023  if (active_ && target_) {
3024  assert(PP2NT(target_) == nt);
3025  STATISTICS(netcon_send_active_);
3026 #if BBTQ == 5
3027  ns->bin_event(tt, this, PP2NT(target_));
3028 #else
3029  ns->event(tt, this, PP2NT(target_));
3030 #endif
3031  }else{
3032  STATISTICS(netcon_send_inactive_);
3033  }
3034 }
3035 
3036 void NetCon::deliver(double tt, NetCvode* ns, NrnThread* nt) {
3037  assert(target_);
3038 if (PP2NT(target_) != nt) {
3039 Printf("NetCon::deliver nt=%d target=%d\n", nt->id, PP2NT(target_)->id);
3040 }
3041  assert(PP2NT(target_) == nt);
3042  Cvode* cv = (Cvode*)target_->nvi_;
3043  int type = target_->prop->type;
3044  if (nrn_use_selfqueue_ && nrn_is_artificial_[type]) {
3045  TQItem** pq = (TQItem**)(&target_->prop->dparam[nrn_artcell_qindex_[type]]._pvoid);
3046  TQItem* q;
3047  while ((q = *(pq)) != nil && q->t_ < tt) {
3048  double t1 = q->t_;
3049  SelfEvent* se = (SelfEvent*)ns->p[nt->id].selfqueue_->remove(q);
3050 //printf("%d NetCon::deliver %g , earlier selfevent at %g\n", nrnmpi_myid, tt, q->t_);
3051  se->deliver(t1, ns, nt);
3052  }
3053  }
3054  if (cvode_active_ && cv) {
3055  ns->local_retreat(tt, cv);
3056  cv->set_init_flag();
3057  }else{
3058 // no interpolation necessary for local step method and ARTIFICIAL_CELL
3059  nt->_t = tt;
3060  }
3061 
3062 //printf("NetCon::deliver t=%g tt=%g %s\n", t, tt, hoc_object_name(target_->ob));
3063  STATISTICS(netcon_deliver_);
3064  POINT_RECEIVE(type, target_, weight_, 0);
3065  if (errno) {
3066  if (nrn_errno_check(type)) {
3067 hoc_warning("errno set during NetCon deliver to NET_RECEIVE", (char*)0);
3068  }
3069  }
3070 }
3071 
3072 NrnThread* NetCon::thread() { return PP2NT(target_); }
3073 
3074 void NetCon::pgvts_deliver(double tt, NetCvode* ns) {
3075  assert(target_);
3076  int type = target_->prop->type;
3077  STATISTICS(netcon_deliver_);
3078  POINT_RECEIVE(type, target_, weight_, 0);
3079  if (errno) {
3080  if (nrn_errno_check(type)) {
3081 hoc_warning("errno set during NetCon deliver to NET_RECEIVE", (char*)0);
3082  }
3083  }
3084 }
3085 
3086 void NetCon::pr(const char* s, double tt, NetCvode* ns) {
3087  Printf("%s %s", s, hoc_object_name(obj_));
3088  if (src_) {
3089  Printf(" src=%s", src_->osrc_ ? hoc_object_name(src_->osrc_):secname(src_->ssrc_));
3090  }else{
3091  Printf(" src=nil");
3092  }
3093  Printf(" target=%s %.15g\n", (target_?hoc_object_name(target_->ob):"nil"), tt);
3094 }
3095 
3096 void PreSyn::send(double tt, NetCvode* ns, NrnThread* nt) {
3097  int i;
3098  record(tt);
3099 #ifndef USENCS
3100  if (use_min_delay_) {
3101  STATISTICS(presyn_send_mindelay_);
3102 #if BBTQ == 3 || BBTQ == 4
3103  ns->fifo_event(tt+delay_, this);
3104 #else
3105 #if BBTQ == 5
3106  for (i=0; i < nrn_nthread; ++i) {
3107  if (nt->id == i) {
3108  ns->bin_event(tt+delay_, this, nt);
3109  }else{
3110  ns->p[i].interthread_send(tt+delay_, this, nrn_threads + i);
3111  }
3112  }
3113 #else
3114  ns->event(tt+delay_, this);
3115 #endif
3116 #endif
3117  }else{
3118  STATISTICS(presyn_send_direct_);
3119  for (int i = dil_.count()-1; i >= 0; --i) {
3120  NetCon* d = dil_.item(i);
3121  if (d->active_ && d->target_) {
3122  NrnThread* n = PP2NT(d->target_);
3123 #if BBTQ == 5
3124  if (nt == n) {
3125  ns->bin_event(tt + d->delay_, d, n);
3126  }else{
3127  ns->p[n->id].interthread_send(tt + d->delay_, d, n);
3128  }
3129 #else
3130  ns->event(tt + d->delay_, d, PP2NT(d->target_));
3131 #endif
3132  }
3133  }
3134  }
3135 #endif //ndef USENCS
3136 #if USENCS || NRNMPI
3137  if (output_index_ >= 0) {
3138 #if BGPDMA
3139  if (use_bgpdma_) {
3140  bgp_dma_send(this, tt);
3141  }else{
3142 #endif //BGPDMA
3143 
3144 #if NRNMPI
3145  if (nrn_use_localgid_) {
3146  nrn_outputevent(localgid_, tt);
3147  }else
3148 #endif //NRNMPI
3149  nrn2ncs_outputevent(output_index_, tt);
3150 #if BGPDMA
3151  }
3152 #endif //BGPDMA
3153 #if NRN_MUSIC
3154  if (music_port_) {
3155  nrnmusic_injectlist(music_port_, tt);
3156  }
3157 #endif // NRN_MUSIC
3158  }
3159 #endif //USENCS || NRNMPI
3160 }
3161 
3162 void PreSyn::deliver(double tt, NetCvode* ns, NrnThread* nt) {
3163  if (qthresh_) {
3164  // the thread is the one that owns the PreSyn
3165  assert(nt == nt_);
3166  qthresh_ = nil;
3167 //printf("PreSyn::deliver %s condition event tt=%20.15g\n", ssrc_?secname(ssrc_):"", tt);
3168  STATISTICS(deliver_qthresh_);
3169  send(tt, ns, nt);
3170  return;
3171  }
3172  // the thread is the one that owns the targets
3173  int i, n = dil_.count();
3174  STATISTICS(presyn_deliver_netcon_);
3175  for (i=0; i < n; ++i) {
3176  NetCon* d = dil_.item(i);
3177  if (d->active_ && d->target_ && PP2NT(d->target_) == nt) {
3178  double dtt = d->delay_ - delay_;
3179  if (dtt == 0.) {
3180  STATISTICS(presyn_deliver_direct_);
3181  STATISTICS(deliver_cnt_);
3182  d->deliver(tt, ns, nt);
3183  }else if (dtt < 0.) {
3184 hoc_execerror("internal error: Source delay is > NetCon delay", 0);
3185  }else{
3186  STATISTICS(presyn_deliver_ncsend_);
3187  ns->event(tt + dtt, d, nt);
3188  }
3189  }
3190  }
3191 }
3192 
3193 // used by bbsavestate since during restore, some NetCon spikes may
3194 // have already been delivered while others need to be delivered in
3195 // the future. Not implemented fof qthresh_ case. No statistics.
3196 void PreSyn::fanout(double td, NetCvode* ns, NrnThread* nt) {
3197  int i, n = dil_.count();
3198  for (i=0; i < n; ++i) {
3199  NetCon* d = dil_.item(i);
3200  if (d->active_ && d->target_ && PP2NT(d->target_) == nt) {
3201  double dtt = d->delay_ - delay_;
3202  ns->bin_event(td + dtt, d, nt);
3203  }
3204  }
3205 }
3206 
3207 NrnThread* PreSyn::thread() { return nt_; }
3208 
3209 void PreSyn::pgvts_deliver(double tt, NetCvode* ns) {
3210  NrnThread* nt = 0;
3211  assert(0);
3212  if (qthresh_) {
3213  qthresh_ = nil;
3214 //printf("PreSyn::deliver %s condition event tt=%20.15g\n", ssrc_?secname(ssrc_):"", tt);
3215  STATISTICS(deliver_qthresh_);
3216  send(tt, ns, nt);
3217  return;
3218  }
3219  int i, n = dil_.count();
3220  STATISTICS(presyn_deliver_netcon_);
3221  for (i=0; i < n; ++i) {
3222  NetCon* d = dil_.item(i);
3223  if (d->active_ && d->target_) {
3224  double dtt = d->delay_ - delay_;
3225  if (0 && dtt == 0.) {
3226  STATISTICS(presyn_deliver_direct_);
3227  STATISTICS(deliver_cnt_);
3228  d->deliver(tt, ns, nt);
3229  }else if (dtt < 0.) {
3230 hoc_execerror("internal error: Source delay is > NetCon delay", 0);
3231  }else{
3232  STATISTICS(presyn_deliver_ncsend_);
3233  ns->event(tt + dtt, d, nt);
3234  }
3235  }
3236  }
3237 }
3238 
3239 void PreSyn::pr(const char* s, double tt, NetCvode* ns) {
3240  Printf("%s", s);
3241  Printf(" PreSyn src=%s", osrc_ ? hoc_object_name(osrc_):secname(ssrc_));
3242  Printf(" %.15g\n", tt);
3243 }
3244 
3245 SelfEvent::SelfEvent() {}
3246 SelfEvent::~SelfEvent() {}
3247 
3248 DiscreteEvent* SelfEvent::savestate_save() {
3249 // pr("savestate_save", 0, net_cvode_instance);
3250  SelfEvent* se = new SelfEvent();
3251  se->flag_ = flag_;
3252  se->target_ = target_;
3253  se->weight_ = weight_;
3254  se->movable_ = movable_;
3255  return se;
3256 }
3257 
3258 void SelfEvent::savestate_restore(double tt, NetCvode* nc) {
3259 // pr("savestate_restore", tt, nc);
3260  net_send(movable_, weight_, target_, tt, flag_);
3261 }
3262 
3263 DiscreteEvent* SelfEvent::savestate_read(FILE* f) {
3264  SelfEvent* se = new SelfEvent();
3265  char buf[300];
3266  char ppname[200];
3267  int ppindex, ncindex, moff, pptype, iml;
3268  double flag;
3269  Object* obj;
3270  nrn_assert(fgets(buf, 300, f));
3271  nrn_assert(sscanf(buf, "%s %d %d %d %d %lf\n", ppname, &ppindex, &pptype, &ncindex, &moff, &flag) == 6);
3272 #if 0
3273  // use of hoc_name2obj is way too inefficient
3274  se->target_ = ob2pntproc(hoc_name2obj(ppname, ppindex));
3275 #else
3276  se->target_ = SelfEvent::index2pp(pptype, ppindex);
3277 #endif
3278  se->weight_ = nil;
3279  if (ncindex >= 0) {
3280 #if 0
3281  // extremely inefficient. There are a LOT of NetCon.
3282  obj = hoc_name2obj("NetCon", ncindex);
3283  assert(obj);
3284  NetCon* nc = (NetCon*)obj->u.this_pointer;
3285 #else
3286  NetCon* nc = NetConSave::index2netcon(ncindex);
3287 #endif
3288  se->weight_ = nc->weight_;
3289  }
3290  se->flag_ = flag;
3291  se->movable_ = nil;
3292  if (moff >= 0) {
3293  se->movable_ = &(se->target_->prop->dparam[moff]._pvoid);
3294  }
3295  return se;
3296 }
3297 
3298 
3299 // put following here to avoid conflict with gnu vector
3300 declareNrnHash(SelfEventPPTable, long, Point_process*)
3301 implementNrnHash(SelfEventPPTable, long, Point_process*)
3302 SelfEventPPTable* SelfEvent::sepp_;
3303 
3304 Point_process* SelfEvent::index2pp(int type, int oindex) {
3305  // code the type and object index together
3306  Point_process* pp;
3307  if (!sepp_) {
3308  int i;
3309  sepp_ = new SelfEventPPTable(211);
3310  // should only be the ones that call net_send
3311  for (i=0; i < n_memb_func; ++i) if (pnt_receive[i]) {
3312  hoc_List* hl = nrn_pnt_template_[i]->olist;
3313  hoc_Item* q;
3314  ITERATE (q, hl) {
3315  Object* o = OBJ(q);
3316  pp = ob2pntproc(o);
3317  (*sepp_)[i + n_memb_func * o->index] = pp;
3318  }
3319  }
3320  }
3321  nrn_assert(sepp_->find(type + n_memb_func*oindex, pp));
3322  return pp;
3323 }
3324 
3325 void SelfEvent::savestate_free() {
3326  if (sepp_) {
3327  delete sepp_;
3328  sepp_ = 0;
3329  }
3330 }
3331 
3332 void SelfEvent::savestate_write(FILE* f) {
3333  fprintf(f, "%d\n", SelfEventType);
3334  int moff = -1;
3335  if (movable_) {
3336  moff = (Datum*)(movable_) - target_->prop->dparam;
3337  assert(movable_ == &(target_->prop->dparam[moff]._pvoid));
3338  }
3339 
3340  int ncindex = -1;
3341  // find the NetCon index for weight_
3342  if (weight_) {
3343  NetCon* nc = NetConSave::weight2netcon(weight_);
3344  assert(nc);
3345  ncindex = nc->obj_->index;
3346  }
3347 
3348  fprintf(f, "%s %d %d %d %d %g\n",
3349  target_->ob->ctemplate->sym->name, target_->ob->index,
3350  target_->prop->type,
3351  ncindex,
3352  moff, flag_
3353  );
3354 }
3355 
3356 void SelfEvent::deliver(double tt, NetCvode* ns, NrnThread* nt) {
3357  Cvode* cv = (Cvode*)target_->nvi_;
3358  int type = target_->prop->type;
3359  assert(nt == PP2NT(target_));
3360  if (nrn_use_selfqueue_ && nrn_is_artificial_[type]) { // handle possible earlier flag=1 self event
3361  if (flag_ == 1.0) { *movable_ = 0; }
3362  TQItem* q;
3363  while ((q = (TQItem*)(*movable_)) != 0 && q->t_ <= tt) {
3364 //printf("handle earlier %g selfqueue event from within %g SelfEvent::deliver\n", q->t_, tt);
3365  double t1 = q->t_;
3366  SelfEvent* se = (SelfEvent*)ns->p[nt->id].selfqueue_->remove(q);
3367  PP2t(target_) = t1;
3368  se->call_net_receive(ns);
3369  }
3370  }
3371  if (cvode_active_ && cv) {
3372  ns->local_retreat(tt, cv);
3373  cv->set_init_flag();
3374  }else{
3375  PP2t(target_) = tt;
3376  }
3377 //printf("SelfEvent::deliver t=%g tt=%g %s\n", PP2t(target), tt, hoc_object_name(target_->ob));
3378  call_net_receive(ns);
3379 }
3380 
3381 NrnThread* SelfEvent::thread() { return PP2NT(target_); }
3382 
3383 void SelfEvent::pgvts_deliver(double tt, NetCvode* ns) {
3384  call_net_receive(ns);
3385 }
3386 void SelfEvent::call_net_receive(NetCvode* ns) {
3387  STATISTICS(selfevent_deliver_);
3388  POINT_RECEIVE(target_->prop->type, target_, weight_, flag_);
3389  if (errno) {
3390  if (nrn_errno_check(target_->prop->type)) {
3391 hoc_warning("errno set during SelfEvent deliver to NET_RECEIVE", (char*)0);
3392  }
3393  }
3394  NetCvodeThreadData& nctd = ns->p[PP2NT(target_)->id];
3395  --nctd.unreffed_event_cnt_;
3396  nctd.sepool_->hpfree(this);
3397 }
3398 
3399 void SelfEvent::pr(const char* s, double tt, NetCvode* ns) {
3400  Printf("%s", s);
3401  Printf(" SelfEvent target=%s %.15g flag=%g\n", hoc_object_name(target_->ob), tt, flag_);
3402 }
3403 
3404 void PlayRecordEvent::frecord_init(TQItem* q) {
3405  plr_->frecord_init(q);
3406 }
3407 
3408 void PlayRecordEvent::deliver(double tt, NetCvode* ns, NrnThread* nt) {
3409  if (plr_->cvode_ && plr_->cvode_->nth_) {
3410  assert(nt == plr_->cvode_->nth_);
3411  ns->local_retreat(tt, plr_->cvode_);
3412  }
3413  STATISTICS(playrecord_deliver_);
3414  plr_->deliver(tt, ns);
3415 }
3416 
3417 NrnThread* PlayRecordEvent::thread() { return nrn_threads + plr_->ith_; }
3418 
3419 void PlayRecordEvent::pr(const char* s, double tt, NetCvode* ns) {
3420  Printf("%s PlayRecordEvent %.15g ", s, tt);
3421  plr_->pr();
3422 }

3424 // For localstep makes sure all cvode instances are at this time and
3425 // makes sure the continuous record records values at this time.

3428 
3429 void TstopEvent::deliver(double tt, NetCvode* ns, NrnThread* nt) {

3431  ns->handle_tstop_event(tt, nt);
3432 }
3433 void TstopEvent::pgvts_deliver(double tt, NetCvode* ns) {
3434  assert(0);
3435  deliver(tt, ns, 0);
3436 }

3439  Printf("%s TstopEvent %.15g\n", s, tt);
3440 }
3441 
3442 DiscreteEvent* TstopEvent::savestate_save() {
3443 // pr("savestate_save", 0, net_cvode_instance);
3444  if (this != tstop_event_) {
3445  hoc_execerror("TstopEvent::savestate_save:", " is not the tstop_event_");
3446  }
