3448 }
3449 
3450 void TstopEvent::savestate_restore(double tt, NetCvode* nc) {
3451 // pr("savestate_restore", tt, nc);
3452  Printf("tstop_event_ onto queue\n");
3453  nc->tstop_event(tt);
3454 }
3455 
3456 DiscreteEvent* TstopEvent::savestate_read(FILE* f) {
3457  return new TstopEvent();
3458 }
3459 
3460 void TstopEvent::savestate_write(FILE* f) {
3461  fprintf(f, "%d\n", TstopEventType);
3462 }
3463 
3464 #include <hocevent.cpp>
3465 
3466 void NetCvode::local_retreat(double t, Cvode* cv) {
3467  if (!cvode_active_) { return; }
3468  TQueue* tq = p[cv->nth_ ? cv->nth_->id : 0].tq_;
3469  if (tq) {
3470 #if PRINT_EVENT
3471  if (print_event_) {
3472 Printf("microstep local retreat from %g (cvode_%p is at %g) for event onset=%g\n", cv->tqitem_->t_, cv, cv->t_, t);
3473  }
3474 #endif
3475  cv->interpolate(t);
3476  tq->move(cv->tqitem_, t);
3477 #if PRINT_EVENT
3478  if (print_event_ > 1) {
3479 Printf("after target solve time for %p is %g , dt=%g\n", cv, cv->time(), nt_dt);
3480  }
3481 #endif
3482  }else{
3483  assert(t == cv->t_ || ( cv->tstop_begin_ <= t && t <= cv->tstop_end_));
3484  }
3485 }
3486 
3487 void NetCvode::retreat(double t, Cvode* cv) {
3488  if (!cvode_active_) { return; }
3489  TQueue* tq = p[cv->nth_ ? cv->nth_->id : 0].tq_;
3490 #if PRINT_EVENT
3491  if (print_event_) {
3492 Printf("microstep retreat from %g (cvode_%p is at %g) for event onset=%g\n",
3493  tq ? cv->tqitem_->t_ : cv->t_, cv, cv->t_, t);
3494  }
3495 #endif
3496  cv->interpolate(t);
3497  if (tq) {
3498  tq->move(cv->tqitem_, t);
3499  }
3500 #if PRINT_EVENT
3501  if (print_event_ > 1) {
3502 Printf("after target solve time for %p is %g , dt=%g\n", cv, cv->time(), dt);
3503  }
3504 #endif
3505 }
3506 
3507 #if USENEOSIM
3508 
3509 bool neosim_deliver_self_events(TQueue* tqe, double til);
3510 bool neosim_deliver_self_events(TQueue* tqe, double til) {
3511  bool b;
3512  TQItem* q;
3513  DiscreteEvent* d;
3514  b = false;
3515  while (tqe->least_t() <= til + .5e-8) {
3516  b = true;
3517  q = tqe->least();
3518  t = q->t_;
3519  d = (DiscreteEvent*)q->data_;
3520  assert(d->type() == SelfEventType);
3521  tqe->remove(q);
3522  d->deliver(t, net_cvode_instance);
3523  }
3524 }
3525 
3526 void neosim2nrn_advance(void* e, void* v, double tout) {
3527  neosim_entity_ = e;
3528  NetCon* d = (NetCon*)v;
3529  TQueue* tqe;
3530 
3531  // now can integrate to tout since it is guaranteed there will
3532  // be no further real events to this cell before tout.
3533  // but we must handle self events. The implementation is
3534  // analogous to the NetCvode::solve with single and tout
3535  Cvode* cv = (Cvode*)d->target_->nvi_; // so self event from INITIAL block
3536  tqe = cv->neosim_self_events_;
3537  // not a bug even if there is no BREAKPOINT block. I.e.
3538  // artificial cells will work.
3539  t = cv->time();
3540  while (tout > t) {
3541  do {
3542  cv->check_deliver();
3543  }while (neosim_deliver_self_events(tqe, t));
3544  cv->solve();
3545  }
3546  cv->interpolate(tout);
3547  cv->check_deliver();
3548 }
3549 
3550 void neosim2nrn_deliver(void* e, void* v) {
3551  neosim_entity_ = e;
3552  NetCon* d = (NetCon*)v;
3553  Cvode* cv = (Cvode*)d->target_->nvi_;
3554  d->deliver(cv->t_, net_cvode_instance);
3555 }
3556 
3557 #endif
3558 
3559 //parallel global variable time-step
3560 int NetCvode::pgvts(double tstop) {
3561  int err = NVI_SUCCESS;
3562  double tt = nt_t;
3563  while (tt < tstop && !stoprun && err == NVI_SUCCESS) {
3564  err = pgvts_event(tt);
3565  }
3566  return err;
3567 }
3568 
3569 // parallel global variable time-step event handling
3570 // return is what cvode call to make and the value of tt to make it at
3571 // in response to the next global event. We try to do only one
3572 // allreduce for a given event. Since all processes have to stay together
3573 // with respect to cvode, we have to factor out those calls from the
3574 // classical DiscreteEvent::deliver methods. I.e. deliver can only
3575 // deliver an event, it cannot interpolate, etc.
3576 // Assume events are sparse and handle them one at a time.
3577 int NetCvode::pgvts_event(double& tt) {
3578  int rank, op, err, init;
3579  DiscreteEvent* de;
3580  assert(gcv_);
3581  de = pgvts_least(tt, op, init);
3582  err = pgvts_cvode(tt, op);
3583  if (init) { gcv_->set_init_flag(); }
3584  if (de) { // handle the event and others just like it
3585  de->pgvts_deliver(tt, this);
3586  while (p[0].tqe_->least_t() == tt) {
3587  TQItem* q = p[0].tqe_->least();
3588  de = (DiscreteEvent*)q->data_;
3589  int i1;
3590  if (de->pgvts_op(i1) == op && i1 == init) {
3591  p[0].tqe_->remove(q);
3592  de->pgvts_deliver(tt, this);
3593  }else{
3594  break;
3595  }
3596  }
3597  }
3598  if (nrn_allthread_handle) { (*nrn_allthread_handle)(); }
3599  return err;
3600 }
3601 
3602 DiscreteEvent* NetCvode::pgvts_least(double& tt, int& op, int& init) {
3603  DiscreteEvent* de = nil;
3604 #if PARANEURON
3605  TQItem* q = nil;
3606  if (gcv_->initialize_ && p[0].tqe_->least_t() > gcv_->t_) {
3607  tt = gcv_->t_;
3608  op = 3;
3609  init = 0;
3610  }else if (gcv_->tn_ < p[0].tqe_->least_t()) {
3611  tt = gcv_->tn_;
3612  op = 1;
3613  init = 0;
3614  }else{
3615  // If there are several events at the same time we need the
3616  // highest priority (in particular, NetParEvent last).
3617  // This is due to the fact that NetParEvent.deliver
3618  // handles all the events at that time so there better not
3619  // be any after it on the queue.
3620  q = p[0].tqe_->least();
3621  if (q) {
3622  de = (DiscreteEvent*)q->data_;
3623  tt = q->t_;
3624  op = de->pgvts_op(init);
3625  if (op == 4) { // is there another event at the same time?
3626  TQItem* q2 = p[0].tqe_->second_least(tt);
3627  if (q2) {
3628  q = q2;
3629  de = (DiscreteEvent*)q2->data_;
3630  op = de->pgvts_op(init);
3631  assert(op != 4);
3632 //printf("%d Type %d event after NetParEvent with deliver %g and t=%g\n", nrnmpi_myid, de->type(), tt, gcv_->t_);
3633  }
3634  }
3635  }else{
3636  tt = 1e20;
3637  op = 1;
3638  init = 0;
3639  }
3640  }
3641  double ts = tt; int ops = op;
3642  if (nrnmpi_pgvts_least(&tt, &op, &init)) {
3643  if (q) {
3644  p[0].tqe_->remove(q);
3645  }
3646  }else if (op == 4) {//NetParEvent need to be done all together
3647  p[0].tqe_->remove(q);
3648  }else if (ts == tt && q && ops == op) { // safe to do this event as well
3649  p[0].tqe_->remove(q);
3650  }else{
3651  de = nil;
3652  }
3653 #endif
3654  return de;
3655 }
3656 
3657 int NetCvode::pgvts_cvode(double tt, int op) {
3658  int err = NVI_SUCCESS;
3659  // this is the only place where we can enter cvode
3660  switch (op) {
3661  case 1: // advance
3662  if (condition_order() == 1) {
3663  gcv_->check_deliver();
3664  }
3665  gcv_->record_continuous();
3666  err = gcv_->advance_tn();
3667  if (condition_order() == 2) {
3668  gcv_->evaluate_conditions();
3669  }
3670  break;
3671  case 2: // interpolate
3672  err = gcv_->interpolate(tt);
3673  break;
3674  case 3: // initialize
3675  err = gcv_->init(tt);
3676  initialized_ = true;
3677  if (condition_order() == 2) {
3678  gcv_->evaluate_conditions();
3679  }
3680  break;
3681  }
3682  return err;
3683 }
3684 
3685 bool NetCvode::use_partrans() {
3686 #if PARANEURON
3687  if ( gcv_) { return gcv_->use_partrans_; } else { return 0; }
3688 #endif
3689  return 0;
3690 }
3691 
3692 void ncs2nrn_integrate(double tstop) {
3693  double ts;
3694  nrn_use_busywait(1); // just a possibility
3695  if (cvode_active_) {
3696 #if PARANEURON
3697  if (net_cvode_instance->use_partrans()) {
3698  net_cvode_instance->pgvts(tstop);
3699  t = nt_t;
3700  dt = nt_dt;
3701  }else
3702 #endif
3703  {
3704  net_cvode_instance->solve(tstop);
3705  t = nt_t;
3706  dt = nt_dt;
3707  }
3708  }else{
3709 #if 1
3710  int n = (int)((tstop - nt_t)/dt + 1e-9);
3711  if (n > 3 && !nrnthread_v_transfer_) {
3712  nrn_fixed_step_group(n);
3713  }else
3714 #endif
3715  {
3716 #if NRNMPI && !defined(USENCS)
3717  ts = tstop - dt;
3718  assert(nt_t <= tstop);
3719  // It may very well be the case that we do not advance at all
3720  while (nt_t <= ts) {
3721 #else
3722  ts = tstop - .5*dt;
3723  while (nt_t < ts) {
3724 #endif
3725  nrn_fixed_step();
3726  if (stoprun) {break;}
3727  }
3728  }
3729  }
3730  // handle all the pending flag=1 self events
3731 for (int i=0; i < nrn_nthread; ++i) { assert(nrn_threads[i]._t == nt_t);}
3732  all_pending_selfqueue(nt_t);
3733  nrn_use_busywait(0); // certainly not
3734 }
3735 
3736 TQueue* NetCvode::event_queue(NrnThread* nt) {
3737  return p[nt->id].tqe_;
3738 }
3739 
3740 static double pending_selfqueue_deliver_;
3741 static void* pending_selfqueue(NrnThread* nt) {
3742  nrn_pending_selfqueue(pending_selfqueue_deliver_, nt);
3743  return 0;
3744 }
3745 
3746 void nrn_pending_selfqueue(double tt, NrnThread* nt) {
3747  NetCvodeThreadData& nctd = net_cvode_instance->p[nt->id];
3748  double ts = nt->_t;
3749 // net_cvode_instance->deliver_events(nctd.immediate_deliver_, nt);
3750  SelfQueue* sq = nctd.selfqueue_;
3751  TQItem* q1, *q2;
3752  nctd.immediate_deliver_ = tt;
3753  for (q1 = sq->first(); q1; q1 = q2) {
3754  if (q1->t_ <= tt) {
3755  SelfEvent* se = (SelfEvent*)q1->data_;
3756 //printf("ncs2nrn_integrate %g SelfEvent for %s at %g\n", tstop, hoc_object_name(se->target_->ob), q1->t_);
3757  se->deliver(q1->t_, net_cvode_instance, nt);
3758  // could it add another self-event?, check before removal
3759  q2 = sq->next(q1);
3760  sq->remove(q1);
3761  }else{
3762  q2 = sq->next(q1);
3763  }
3764  }
3765  assert(nctd.tqe_->least_t() >= tt);
3766  nt->_t = ts;
3767  nctd.immediate_deliver_ = -1e100;
3768 }
3769 
3770 // only the main thread can calls this
3771 static void all_pending_selfqueue(double tt) {
3772  if (nrn_use_selfqueue_) {
3773  nrn_wait_for_threads();
3774 //for (int i=0; i < nrn_nthread; ++i) { assert(nrn_threads[i]._t == nt_t);}
3775  pending_selfqueue_deliver_ = tt;
3776  nrn_multithread_job(pending_selfqueue);
3777  }
3778 }
3779 
3780 #if USENCS
3781 
3782 void ncs2nrn_inputevent(int i, double tdeliver) {
3783  NrnThread* nt = nrn_threads;
3784  net_cvode_instance->event(tdeliver, ncs2nrn_input_->item(i), nt);
3785 }
3786 
3787 // hoc tells us which are the input NetCons and which are the
3788 // output NetCons
3789 
3790 void nrn2ncs_netcons() {
3791  int i;
3792  Object* o;
3793  NetCon* nc;
3794  o = *hoc_objgetarg(1);
3795  check_obj_type(o, "List");
3796  OcList* list = (OcList*)(o->u.this_pointer);
3797  if (ncs2nrn_input_) {
3798  for (i=0; i < ncs2nrn_input_->count(); ++i) {
3799  hoc_obj_unref(ncs2nrn_input_->item(i)->obj_);
3800  }
3801  ncs2nrn_input_->remove_all();
3802  }else{
3803  ncs2nrn_input_ = new NetConPList(list->count());
3804 
3805  }
3806  for (i=0; i < list->count(); ++i) {
3807  hoc_obj_ref(list->object(i));
3808  nc = (NetCon*)(list->object(i)->u.this_pointer);
3809  ncs2nrn_input_->append(nc);
3810  }
3811 
3812  o = *hoc_objgetarg(2);
3813  check_obj_type(o, "List");
3814  list = (OcList*)(o->u.this_pointer);
3815  for (i=0; i < list->count(); ++i) {
3816  nc = (NetCon*)(list->object(i)->u.this_pointer);
3817  assert(nc->src_);
3818  nc->src_->output_index_ = i;
3819  }
3820 }
3821 
3822 #endif //USENCS
3823 
3824 void NetCvode::statistics(int i) {
3825  int id, j, ii = 0;
3826  if (gcv_) {
3827  gcv_->statistics();
3828  }else{
3829  lvardtloop(id, j) {
3830  if (i < 0 || ii++ == i) {
3831  p[id].lcv_[j].statistics();
3832  }
3833  }
3834  }
3835  Printf("NetCon active=%lu (not sent)=%lu delivered=%lu\n", NetCon::netcon_send_active_, NetCon::netcon_send_inactive_, NetCon::netcon_deliver_);
3836  Printf("Condition O2 thresh detect=%lu via init=%lu effective=%lu abandoned=%lu (unnecesarily=%lu init+=%lu init-=%lu above=%lu below=%lu)\n",ConditionEvent::send_qthresh_, ConditionEvent::init_above_, ConditionEvent::deliver_qthresh_, ConditionEvent::abandon_, ConditionEvent::eq_abandon_, ConditionEvent::abandon_init_above_, ConditionEvent::abandon_init_below_, ConditionEvent::abandon_above_, ConditionEvent::abandon_below_);
3837  Printf("PreSyn send: mindelay=%lu direct=%lu\n", PreSyn::presyn_send_mindelay_, PreSyn::presyn_send_direct_);
3838  Printf("PreSyn deliver: O2 thresh=%lu NetCon=%lu (send=%lu deliver=%lu)\n", ConditionEvent::deliver_qthresh_, PreSyn::presyn_deliver_netcon_, PreSyn::presyn_deliver_ncsend_, PreSyn::presyn_deliver_direct_);
3839  Printf("SelfEvent send=%lu move=%lu deliver=%lu\n", SelfEvent::selfevent_send_, SelfEvent::selfevent_move_, SelfEvent::selfevent_deliver_);
3840  Printf("Watch send=%lu deliver=%lu\n", WatchCondition::watch_send_, WatchCondition::watch_deliver_);
3841  Printf("PlayRecord send=%lu deliver=%lu\n", PlayRecordEvent::playrecord_send_, PlayRecordEvent::playrecord_deliver_);
3842  Printf("HocEvent send=%lu deliver=%lu\n", HocEvent::hocevent_send_, HocEvent::hocevent_deliver_);
3843  Printf("SingleEvent deliver=%lu move=%lu\n", KSSingle::singleevent_deliver_, KSSingle::singleevent_move_);
3844  Printf("DiscreteEvent send=%lu deliver=%lu\n", DiscreteEvent::discretevent_send_, DiscreteEvent::discretevent_deliver_);
3845  Printf("%lu total events delivered net_event=%lu\n", deliver_cnt_, net_event_cnt_);
3846  Printf("Discrete event TQueue\n");
3847  p[0].tqe_->statistics();
3848  if (p[0].tq_) {
3849  Printf("Variable step integrator TQueue\n");
3850  p[0].tq_->statistics();
3851  }
3852 }
3853 
3854 void NetCvode::spike_stat() {
3855  Vect* v = vector_arg(1);
3856  v->resize(11);
3857  double* d = vector_vec(v);
3858  int i, j, n = 0;
3859  if (gcv_) {
3860  n += gcv_->neq_;
3861  }else{
3862  lvardtloop(i,j) {
3863  n += p[i].lcv_[j].neq_;
3864  }
3865  }
3866  d[0] = n;
3867  Symbol* nc = hoc_lookup("NetCon");
3868  d[1] = nc->u.ctemplate->count;
3869  d[2] = deliver_cnt_;
3870  d[3] = NetCon::netcon_deliver_;
3871  d[4] = PreSyn::presyn_send_mindelay_ + PreSyn::presyn_send_direct_;
3872  d[5] = SelfEvent::selfevent_deliver_;
3873  d[6] = SelfEvent::selfevent_send_;
3874  d[7] = SelfEvent::selfevent_move_;
3875  // should do all threads
3876  p[0].tqe_->spike_stat(d+8);
3877 }
3878 
3879 void NetCvode::solver_prepare() {
3880  int i, j;
3881  fornetcon_prepare();
3882  if (nrn_modeltype() == 0) {
3883  delete_list();
3884  }else{
3885  init_global();
3886  if (cvode_active_) {
3887  if (matrix_change_cnt_ != nrn_matrix_cnt_) {
3888  structure_change();
3889  matrix_change_cnt_ = nrn_matrix_cnt_;
3890  }
3891  if (gcv_) {
3892  gcv_->use_daspk_ = nrn_use_daspk_;
3893  gcv_->init_prepare();
3894  // since there may be Vector.play events and INITIAL send events
3895  // at time 0 before actual initialization of integrators.
3896  gcv_->can_retreat_ = false;
3897  }else{
3898  lvardtloop(i,j) {
3899  Cvode& cv = p[i].lcv_[j];
3900  cv.use_daspk_ = nrn_use_daspk_;
3901  cv.init_prepare();
3902  cv.can_retreat_ = false;
3903  }
3904  }
3905  }
3906  }
3907  if (playrec_change_cnt_ != structure_change_cnt_) {
3908  playrec_setup();
3909  }
3910 }
3911 
3912 void NetCvode::re_init(double t) {
3913  int i, j, k, l;
3914  if (nrn_modeltype() == 0) {
3915  if (gcv_) {
3916  gcv_->t_ = t; gcv_->tn_ = t;
3917  }else{
3918  lvardtloop(i,j) {
3919  Cvode& cv = p[i].lcv_[j];
3920  cv.t_ = t; cv.tn_ = t;
3921  }
3922  }
3923  return;
3924  }
3925  double dtsav = nt_dt;
3926  solver_prepare();
3927  if (gcv_) {
3928  gcv_->stat_init();
3929  gcv_->init(t);
3930  if (condition_order() == 2) {
3931  gcv_->evaluate_conditions();
3932  }
3933  }else{
3934  lvardtloop(i, j) {
3935  Cvode& cv = p[i].lcv_[j];
3936  cv.stat_init();
3937  cv.init(t);
3938  cv.tqitem_->t_ = t;
3939  if (condition_order() == 2) {
3940  cv.evaluate_conditions();
3941  }
3942  }
3943  }
3944  nt_dt = dtsav;
3945 }
3946 
3947 void NetCvode::fornetcon_prepare() {
3948  NrnThread* nt;
3949  NrnThreadMembList* tml;
3950  if (fornetcon_change_cnt_ == structure_change_cnt) { return; }
3951  fornetcon_change_cnt_ = structure_change_cnt;
3952  if (nrn_fornetcon_cnt_ == 0) { return; }
3953  int i, j;
3954  // initialize a map from type to dparam index, -1 means no FOR_NETCONS statement
3955  int* t2i = new int[n_memb_func];
3956  for (i=0; i < n_memb_func; ++i) { t2i[i] = -1; }
3957  // create ForNetConsInfo in all the relevant point processes
3958  // and fill in the t2i map.
3959  for (i = 0; i < nrn_fornetcon_cnt_; ++i) {
3960  int index = nrn_fornetcon_index_[i];
3961  int type = nrn_fornetcon_type_[i];
3962  t2i[type] = index;
3963  if (nrn_is_artificial_[type]) {
3964  Memb_list* m = memb_list + type;
3965  for (j = 0; j < m->nodecount; ++j) {
3966  void** v = &(m->pdata[j][index]._pvoid);
3967  _nrn_free_fornetcon(v);
3968  ForNetConsInfo* fnc = new ForNetConsInfo;
3969  *v = fnc;
3970  fnc->argslist = 0;
3971  fnc->size = 0;
3972  }
3973  }else{
3974  FOR_THREADS(nt) for(tml = nt->tml; tml; tml = tml->next) if (tml->index == type) {
3975  Memb_list* m = tml->ml;
3976  for (j = 0; j < m->nodecount; ++j) {
3977  void** v = &(m->pdata[j][index]._pvoid);
3978  _nrn_free_fornetcon(v);
3979  ForNetConsInfo* fnc = new ForNetConsInfo;
3980  *v = fnc;
3981  fnc->argslist = 0;
3982  fnc->size = 0;
3983  }
3984  }
3985  }
3986  }
3987  // two loops over all netcons. one to count, one to fill in argslist
3988  // count
3989  hoc_Item* q;
3990  if (psl_) ITERATE(q, psl_) {
3991  PreSyn* ps = (PreSyn*)VOIDITM(q);
3992  NetConPList& dil = ps->dil_;
3993  for (int i=0; i < dil.count(); ++i) {
3994  NetCon* d1 = dil.item(i);
3995  Point_process* pnt = d1->target_;
3996  if (pnt && t2i[pnt->prop->type] > -1) {
3997 ForNetConsInfo* fnc = (ForNetConsInfo*)pnt->prop->dparam[t2i[pnt->prop->type]]._pvoid;
3998  assert(fnc);
3999  fnc->size += 1;
4000  }
4001  }
4002  }
4003 
4004  // allocate argslist space and initialize for another count
4005  for (i = 0; i < nrn_fornetcon_cnt_; ++i) {
4006  int index = nrn_fornetcon_index_[i];
4007  int type = nrn_fornetcon_type_[i];
4008  if (nrn_is_artificial_[type]) {
4009  Memb_list* m = memb_list + type;
4010  for (j = 0; j < m->nodecount; ++j) {
4011  ForNetConsInfo* fnc = (ForNetConsInfo*)m->pdata[j][index]._pvoid;
4012  if (fnc->size > 0) {
4013  fnc->argslist = new double*[fnc->size];
4014  fnc->size = 0;
4015  }
4016  }
4017  }else{
4018  FOR_THREADS(nt) for(tml = nt->tml; tml; tml = tml->next) if (tml->index == nrn_fornetcon_type_[i]) {
4019  Memb_list* m = tml->ml;
4020  for (j = 0; j < m->nodecount; ++j) {
4021  ForNetConsInfo* fnc = (ForNetConsInfo*)m->pdata[j][index]._pvoid;
4022  if (fnc->size > 0) {
4023  fnc->argslist = new double*[fnc->size];
4024  fnc->size = 0;
4025  }
4026  }
4027  }
4028  }
4029  }
4030  // fill in argslist and count again
4031  if (psl_) ITERATE(q, psl_) {
4032  PreSyn* ps = (PreSyn*)VOIDITM(q);
4033  NetConPList& dil = ps->dil_;
4034  for (int i=0; i < dil.count(); ++i) {
4035  NetCon* d1 = dil.item(i);
4036  Point_process* pnt = d1->target_;
4037  if (pnt && t2i[pnt->prop->type] > -1) {
4038 ForNetConsInfo* fnc = (ForNetConsInfo*)pnt->prop->dparam[t2i[pnt->prop->type]]._pvoid;
4039  fnc->argslist[fnc->size] = d1->weight_;
4040  fnc->size += 1;
4041  }
4042  }
4043  }
4044  delete [] t2i;
4045 }
4046 
4047 int _nrn_netcon_args(void* v, double*** argslist) {
4048  ForNetConsInfo* fnc = (ForNetConsInfo*)v;
4049  assert(fnc);
4050  *argslist = fnc->argslist;
4051  return fnc->size;
4052 }
4053 
4054 void _nrn_free_fornetcon(void** v) {
4055  ForNetConsInfo* fnc = (ForNetConsInfo*)(*v);
4056  if (fnc) {
4057  if (fnc->argslist) {
4058  delete [] fnc->argslist;
4059  }
4060  delete fnc;
4061  *v = nil;
4062  }
4063 }
4064 
4065 extern "C" {
4066 void record_init_clear(const TQItem* q, int) {
4067  DiscreteEvent* d = (DiscreteEvent*)q->data_;
4068  d->frecord_init((TQItem*)q);
4069 }
4070 };
4071 
4072 void NetCvode::record_init() {
4073  int i, cnt = prl_->count();
4074  if (cnt) {
4075  // there may be some events on the queue descended from
4076  // finitialize that need to be removed
4077  record_init_items_->remove_all();
4078  p[0].tqe_->forall_callback(record_init_clear);
4079  int j, jcnt = record_init_items_->count();
4080  for (j=0; j < jcnt; ++j) {
4081  p[0].tqe_->remove(record_init_items_->item(j));
4082  }
4083  record_init_items_->remove_all();
4084  }
4085  for (i=0; i < cnt; ++i) {
4086  prl_->item(i)->record_init();
4087  }
4088 }
4089 
4090 void NetCvode::play_init() {
4091  int i, cnt = prl_->count();
4092  for (i=0; i < cnt; ++i) {
4093  prl_->item(i)->play_init();
4094  }
4095 }
4096 
4097 int NetCvode::cellindex() {
4098  Section* sec = chk_access();
4099  int i, j, ii;
4100  if (single_) {
4101  return 0;
4102  }else{
4103  ii = 0;
4104  lvardtloop(i, j) {
4105  if (sec == p[i].lcv_[j].ctd_[0].v_node_[p[i].lcv_[j].ctd_[0].rootnodecount_]->sec) {
4106  return ii;
4107  }
4108  ii++;
4109  }
4110  }
4111  hoc_execerror(secname(sec), " is not the root section for any local step cvode instance");
4112  return 0;
4113 }
4114 
4115 void NetCvode::states() {
4116  int i, j, k, n;
4117  Vect* v = vector_arg(1);
4118  if (!cvode_active_){
4119  v->resize(0);
4120  return;
4121  }
4122  double* vp;
4123  n = 0;
4124  if (gcv_) {
4125  n += gcv_->neq_;
4126  }else{
4127  lvardtloop(i, j) {
4128  n += p[i].lcv_[j].neq_;
4129  }
4130  }
4131  v->resize(n);
4132  vp = vector_vec(v);
4133  k = 0;
4134  if (gcv_) {
4135  gcv_->states(vp);
4136  }else{
4137  lvardtloop(i, j) {
4138  p[i].lcv_[j].states(vp+k);
4139  k += p[i].lcv_[j].neq_;
4140  }
4141  }
4142 }
4143 
4144 void NetCvode::dstates() {
4145  int i, j, k, n;
4146  Vect* v = vector_arg(1);
4147  if (!cvode_active_){
4148  v->resize(0);
4149  return;
4150  }
4151  double* vp;
4152  n = 0;
4153  if (gcv_) {
4154  n += gcv_->neq_;
4155  }else{
4156  lvardtloop(i, j) {
4157  n += p[i].lcv_[j].neq_;
4158  }
4159  }
4160  v->resize(n);
4161  vp = vector_vec(v);
4162  k = 0;
4163  if (gcv_) {
4164  gcv_->dstates(vp);
4165  }else{
4166  lvardtloop(i, j) {
4167  p[i].lcv_[j].dstates(vp+k);
4168  k += p[i].lcv_[j].neq_;
4169  }
4170  }
4171 }
4172 
4173 void nrn_cvfun(double t, double* y, double* ydot) {
4174  NetCvode* d = net_cvode_instance;
4175  d->gcv_->fun_thread(t, y, ydot, nrn_threads);
4176 }
4177 
4178 double nrn_hoc2fixed_step(void*) {
4179  nrn_fixed_step();
4180  return 0.;
4181 }
4182 
4183 double nrn_hoc2fun(void* v) {
4184  NetCvode* d = (NetCvode*)v;
4185  double tt = *getarg(1);
4186  Vect* s = vector_arg(2);
4187  Vect* ds = vector_arg(3);
4188  if (!d->gcv_){hoc_execerror("not global variable time step", 0);}
4189  if (s->capacity() != d->gcv_->neq_) { hoc_execerror("size of state vector != number of state equations", 0); }
4190  if (nrn_nthread > 1) {hoc_execerror("only one thread allowed", 0);}
4191  ds->resize(s->capacity());
4192  nrn_cvfun(tt, vector_vec(s), vector_vec(ds));
4193  return 0.;
4194 }
4195 
4196 double nrn_hoc2scatter_y(void* v) {
4197  NetCvode* d = (NetCvode*)v;
4198  Vect* s = vector_arg(1);
4199  if (!d->gcv_){hoc_execerror("not global variable time step", 0);}
4200  if (s->capacity() != d->gcv_->neq_) { hoc_execerror("size of state vector != number of state equations", 0); }
4201  if (nrn_nthread > 1) {hoc_execerror("only one thread allowed", 0);}
4202  d->gcv_->scatter_y(vector_vec(s), 0);
4203  return 0.;
4204 }
4205 
4206 double nrn_hoc2gather_y(void* v) {
4207  NetCvode* d = (NetCvode*)v;
4208  Vect* s = vector_arg(1);
4209  if (!d->gcv_){hoc_execerror("not global variable time step", 0);}
4210  if (nrn_nthread > 1) {hoc_execerror("only one thread allowed", 0);}
4211  s->resize(d->gcv_->neq_);
4212  d->gcv_->gather_y(vector_vec(s), 0);
4213  return s->capacity();
4214 }
4215 
4216 void NetCvode::error_weights() {
4217  int i, j, k, n;
4218  Vect* v = vector_arg(1);
4219  if (!cvode_active_){
4220  v->resize(0);
4221  return;
4222  }
4223  double* vp;
4224  n = 0;
4225  if (gcv_) {
4226  n += gcv_->neq_;
4227  }else{
4228  lvardtloop(i, j) {
4229  n += p[i].lcv_[j].neq_;
4230  }
4231  }
4232  v->resize(n);
4233  vp = vector_vec(v);
4234  k = 0;
4235  if (gcv_) {
4236  gcv_->states(vp + j);
4237  }else{
4238  lvardtloop(i, j) {
4239  p[i].lcv_[j].error_weights(vp+k);
4240  k += p[i].lcv_[j].neq_;
4241  }
4242  }
4243 }
4244 
4245 void NetCvode::acor() {
4246  int i, j, k, n;
4247  Vect* v = vector_arg(1);
4248  if (!cvode_active_){
4249  v->resize(0);
4250  return;
4251  }
4252  double* vp;
4253  n = 0;
4254  if (gcv_) {
4255  n += gcv_->neq_;
4256  }else{
4257  lvardtloop(i, j) {
4258  n += p[i].lcv_[j].neq_;
4259  }
4260  }
4261  v->resize(n);
4262  vp = vector_vec(v);
4263  k = 0;
4264  if (gcv_) {
4265  gcv_->states(vp + j);
4266  }else{
4267  lvardtloop(i, j) {
4268  p[i].lcv_[j].acor(vp+k);
4269  k += p[i].lcv_[j].neq_;
4270  }
4271  }
4272 }
4273 
4274 const char* NetCvode::statename(int is, int style) {
4275  int i, it, j, n, neq;
4276  if (!cvode_active_){
4277  hoc_execerror("Cvode is not active", 0);
4278  }
4279  double** pv;
4280  n = 0;
4281  if (gcv_) {
4282  n += gcv_->neq_;
4283  }else{
4284  lvardtloop(i, j) {
4285  n += p[i].lcv_[j].neq_;
4286  }
4287  }
4288  if (is >= n) {
4289  hoc_execerror("Cvode::statename argument out of range", 0);
4290  }
4291  if (!hdp_ || hdp_->style() != style) {
4292  if (hdp_) {
4293  delete hdp_;
4294  }
4295  hdp_ = new HocDataPaths(2*n, style);
4296  if (gcv_) {
4297  for (it=0; it < nrn_nthread; ++it){
4298  CvodeThreadData& z = gcv_->ctd_[it];
4299  neq = z.nvsize_;
4300  pv = z.pv_;
4301  for (j=0; j < z.nonvint_extra_offset_; ++j) {
4302  hdp_->append(pv[j]);
4303  }
4304  }
4305  }else{
4306  lvardtloop(it, i) {
4307  neq = p[it].lcv_[i].ctd_[0].nvsize_;
4308  pv = p[it].lcv_[i].ctd_[0].pv_;
4309  for (j=0; j < neq; ++j) {
4310  hdp_->append(pv[j]);
4311  }
4312  }
4313  }
4314  hdp_->search();
4315  }
4316  j = 0;
4317  if (gcv_) {
4318  for (it=0; it < nrn_nthread; ++it){
4319  CvodeThreadData& z = gcv_->ctd_[it];
4320  if (j + z.nvoffset_ + z.nvsize_ > is) {
4321  if (style == 2) {
4322  Symbol* sym = hdp_->retrieve_sym(z.pv_[is - j]);
4323  assert(sym);
4324  return sym2name(sym);
4325  }else{
4326  String* s = hdp_->retrieve(z.pv_[is - j]);
4327  if (s) {
4328  return s->string();
4329  }else{
4330  return "unknown";
4331  }
4332  }
4333  }
4334  j += z.nvsize_;
4335  }
4336  }else{
4337  lvardtloop(it, i) {
4338  if (j + p[it].lcv_[i].neq_ > is) {
4339  CvodeThreadData& z = p[it].lcv_[i].ctd_[0];
4340  if (style == 2) {
4341  Symbol* sym = hdp_->retrieve_sym(z.pv_[is - j]);
4342  assert(sym);
4343  return sym2name(sym);
4344  }else{
4345  String* s = hdp_->retrieve(z.pv_[is - j]);
4346  if (s) {
4347  return s->string();
4348  }else{
4349  return "unknown";
4350  }
4351  }
4352  }
4353  j += p[it].lcv_[i].neq_;
4354  }
4355  }
4356  return "unknown";
4357 }
4358 
4359 const char* NetCvode::sym2name(Symbol* sym) {
4360  if (sym->type == RANGEVAR && sym->u.rng.type > 1
4361  && memb_func[sym->u.rng.type].is_point) {
4362  static char buf[200];
4363  sprintf(buf, "%s.%s", memb_func[sym->u.rng.type].sym->name, sym->name);
4364  return buf;
4365  }else{
4366  return sym->name;
4367  }
4368 }
4369 
4370 Symbol* NetCvode::name2sym(const char* name) {
4371  char* buf = new char[strlen(name)+1];
4372  strcpy(buf, name);
4373  char* cp;
4374  for (cp = buf; *cp; ++cp) {
4375  if (*cp == '.') {
4376  *cp = '\0';
4377  ++cp;
4378  break;
4379  }
4380  }
4381  Symbol* sym = hoc_table_lookup(buf, hoc_built_in_symlist);
4382  if (!sym) {
4383  sym = hoc_table_lookup(buf, hoc_top_level_symlist);
4384  }
4385  if (sym && *cp == '\0' && (sym->type == RANGEVAR || strcmp(sym->name, "Vector") == 0)) {
4386  delete [] buf;
4387  return sym;
4388  }else if (sym && sym->type == TEMPLATE && *cp != '\0') {
4389  sym = hoc_table_lookup(cp, sym->u.ctemplate->symtable);
4390  if (sym) {
4391  delete [] buf;
4392  return sym;
4393  }
4394  }
4395  delete [] buf;
4396  hoc_execerror(name, "must be in form rangevar or Template.var");
4397  return nil;
4398 }
4399 
4400 void NetCvode::rtol(double x) {
4401  rtol_ = x;
4402 }
4403 void NetCvode::atol(double x) {
4404  atol_ = x;
4405 }
4406 void NetCvode::stiff(int x) {
4407  if ((stiff_ == 0) != (x == 0)) { // need to free if change between 0 and nonzero
4408  if (gcv_) {
4409  gcv_->free_cvodemem();
4410  }else{
4411  int i, j;
4412  lvardtloop(i,j) {
4413  p[i].lcv_[j].free_cvodemem();
4414  }
4415  }
4416  }
4417  stiff_ = x;
4418 }
4419 void NetCvode::maxorder(int x) {
4420  maxorder_ = x;
4421  if (gcv_) {
4422  gcv_->maxorder(maxorder_);
4423  }else{
4424  int i, j;
4425  lvardtloop(i,j) {
4426  p[i].lcv_[j].maxorder(maxorder_);
4427  }
4428  }
4429 }
4430 int NetCvode::order(int ii) {
4431  int o = 0;
4432  if (gcv_) {
4433  o = gcv_->order();
4434  }else{
4435  int i, j, i2 = 0;
4436  lvardtloop(i,j) {
4437  if (ii == i2++) {
4438  o = p[i].lcv_[j].order();
4439  }
4440  }
4441  }
4442  return o;
4443 }
4444 void NetCvode::minstep(double x) {
4445  minstep_ = x;
4446  if (gcv_) {
4447  gcv_->minstep(minstep_);
4448  }else{
4449  int i, j;
4450  lvardtloop(i,j) {
4451  p[i].lcv_[j].minstep(minstep_);
4452  }
4453  }
4454 }
4455 void NetCvode::maxstep(double x) {
4456  maxstep_ = x;
4457  if (gcv_) {
4458  gcv_->maxstep(maxstep_);
4459  }else{
4460  int i, j;
4461  lvardtloop(i,j) {
4462  p[i].lcv_[j].maxstep(maxstep_);
4463  }
4464  }
4465 }
4466 void NetCvode::jacobian(int x) {
4467  jacobian_ = x;
4468 }
4469 void NetCvode::structure_change() {
4470  if (gcv_) {
4471  gcv_->structure_change_ = true;
4472  }else{
4473  int i, j;
4474  lvardtloop(i,j) {
4475  p[i].lcv_[j].structure_change_ = true;
4476  }
4477  }
4478 }
4479 
4480 NetCon* NetCvode::install_deliver(double* dsrc, Section* ssrc, Object* osrc,
4481  Object* target, double threshold, double delay, double magnitude
4482  ) {
4483  PreSyn* ps = nil;
4484  double* psrc = nil;
4485  int i;
4486  if (ssrc) { consist_sec_pd("NetCon", ssrc, dsrc); }
4487  if (!pst_) {
4488  pst_ = new PreSynTable(1000);
4489  pst_cnt_ = 0;
4490  }
4491  if (!psl_) {
4492  psl_ = hoc_l_newlist();
4493  }
4494  if (osrc) {
4495  if (dsrc) {
4496  psrc = dsrc;
4497  }else{
4498  char buf[256];
4499  if (hoc_table_lookup("x", osrc->ctemplate->symtable)) {
4500  sprintf(buf, "%s.x", hoc_object_name(osrc));
4501  psrc = hoc_val_pointer(buf);
4502  }
4503  }
4504  }else{
4505  psrc = dsrc;
4506  }
4507  if (psrc) {
4508  if (!pst_->find(ps, psrc)) {
4509  ps = new PreSyn(psrc, osrc, ssrc);
4510  ps->hi_ = hoc_l_insertvoid(psl_, ps);
4511  pst_->insert(psrc, ps);
4512  ++pst_cnt_;
4513  }
4514  if (threshold != -1e9) { ps->threshold_ = threshold; }
4515  }else if (osrc){
4516  Point_process* pnt = ob2pntproc(osrc);
4517  if (pnt->presyn_) {
4518  ps = (PreSyn*)pnt->presyn_;
4519  }else{
4520  ps = new PreSyn(psrc, osrc, ssrc);
4521  if (threshold != -1e9) { ps->threshold_ = threshold; }
4522  ps->hi_ = hoc_l_insertvoid(psl_, ps);
4523  pnt->presyn_ = ps;
4524  }
4525  }else if (target) { // no source so use the special presyn
4526  if (!unused_presyn) {
4527  unused_presyn = new PreSyn(nil, nil, nil);
4528  unused_presyn->hi_ = hoc_l_insertvoid(psl_, unused_presyn);
4529  }
4530  ps = unused_presyn;
4531  }
4532  ps_thread_link(ps);
4533  NetCon* d = new NetCon(ps, target);
4534  d->delay_ = delay;
4535  d->weight_[0] = magnitude;
4536  structure_change_cnt_ = 0;
4537  return d;
4538 }
4539 
4540 void NetCvode::psl_append(PreSyn* ps) {
4541  if (!psl_) {
4542  psl_ = hoc_l_newlist();
4543  }
4544  ps->hi_ = hoc_l_insertvoid(psl_, ps);
4545 }
4546 
4547 void NetCvode::presyn_disconnect(PreSyn* ps) {
4548  if (ps == unused_presyn) {
4549  unused_presyn = nil;
4550  }
4551  if (ps->hi_) {
4552  hoc_l_delete(ps->hi_);
4553  ps->hi_ = nil;
4554  }
4555  if (ps->hi_th_) {
4556  hoc_l_delete(ps->hi_th_);
4557  ps->hi_th_ = nil;
4558  }
4559  if (ps->thvar_) {
4560  --pst_cnt_;
4561  pst_->remove(ps->thvar_);
4562  ps->thvar_ = nil;
4563  }
4564  if (gcv_) {
4565  for (int it = 0; it < gcv_->nctd_; ++it) {
4566  PreSynList* psl = gcv_->ctd_[it].psl_th_;
4567  if (psl) for (int j = 0; j < psl->count(); ++j) {
4568  if (psl->item(j) == ps) {
4569  psl->remove(j);
4570  return;
4571  }
4572  }
4573  }
4574  }else{
4575  int i, j;
4576  lvardtloop(i, j) {
4577  PreSynList* psl = p[i].lcv_[j].ctd_[0].psl_th_;
4578  if (psl) for (int j = 0; j < psl->count(); ++j) {
4579  if (psl->item(j) == ps) {
4580  psl->remove(j);
4581  return;
4582  }
4583  }
4584  }
4585  }
4586 }
4587 
4588 DiscreteEvent::DiscreteEvent() {}
4589 DiscreteEvent::~DiscreteEvent() {}
4590 
4591 DiscreteEvent* DiscreteEvent::savestate_save() {
4592 // pr("savestate_save", 0, net_cvode_instance);
4593  if (this != null_event_) {
4594  pr("savestate_save", 0, net_cvode_instance);
4595  hoc_execerror("DiscreteEvent::savestate_save:", " is not the null_event_");
4596  }
4597  return new DiscreteEvent();
4598 }
4599 
4600 void DiscreteEvent::savestate_restore(double tt, NetCvode* nc) {
4601 // pr("savestate_restore", tt, nc);
4602  Printf("null_event_ onto queue\n");
4603  nc->null_event(tt);
4604 }
4605 
4606 DiscreteEvent* DiscreteEvent::savestate_read(FILE* f) {
4607  return new DiscreteEvent();
4608 }
4609 
4610 void DiscreteEvent::savestate_write(FILE* f) {
4611  fprintf(f, "%d\n", DiscreteEventType);
4612 }
4613 
4614 NetCon::NetCon() {
4615  cnt_ = 0; obj_ = nil; active_ = false; weight_ = nil;
4616  NetConSave::invalid();
4617 }
4618 
4619 NetCon::NetCon(PreSyn* src, Object* target) {
4620  NetConSave::invalid();
4621  obj_ = nil;
4622  src_ = src;
4623  delay_ = 1.0;
4624  if (src_) {
4625  src_->dil_.append((NetCon*)this);
4626  src_->use_min_delay_ = 0;
4627  }
4628  if (target == nil) {
4629  target_ = nil;
4630  active_ = false;
4631  cnt_ = 1;
4632  weight_ = new double[cnt_];
4633  weight_[0] = 0.0;
4634  return;
4635  }
4636  target_ = ob2pntproc(target);
4637  active_ = true;
4638 #if DISCRETE_EVENT_OBSERVER
4639  ObjObservable::Attach(target, this);
4640 #endif
4641  if (!pnt_receive[target_->prop->type]) {
4642 hoc_execerror("No NET_RECEIVE in target PointProcess:", hoc_object_name(target));
4643  }
4644  cnt_ = pnt_receive_size[target_->prop->type];
4645  weight_ = nil;
4646  if (cnt_) {
4647  weight_ = new double[cnt_];
4648  for (int i=0; i < cnt_; ++i) {
4649  weight_[i] = 0.0;
4650  }
4651  }
4652 }
4653 
4654 NetCon::~NetCon() {
4655 //printf("~NetCon\n");
4656  NetConSave::invalid();
4657  rmsrc();
4658  if (cnt_) {
4659  delete [] weight_;
4660  }
4661 #if DISCRETE_EVENT_OBSERVER
4662  if (target_) {
4663  ObjObservable::Detach(target_->ob, this);
4664  }
4665 #endif
4666 }
4667 
4668 void NetCon::rmsrc() {
4669  if (src_) {
4670  for (int i=0; i < src_->dil_.count(); ++i) {
4671  if (src_->dil_.item(i) == this) {
4672  src_->dil_.remove(i);
4673  if (src_->dil_.count() == 0 && src_->tvec_ == nil
4674  && src_->idvec_ == nil) {
4675 #if 1 || NRNMPI
4676  if (src_->output_index_ == -1)
4677 #endif
4678  delete src_;
4679  }
4680  break;
4681  }
4682  }
4683  }
4684  src_ = nil;
4685 }
4686 
4687 void NetCon::replace_src(PreSyn* p) {
4688  rmsrc();
4689  src_ = p;
4690  if (src_) {
4691  src_->dil_.append((NetCon*)this);
4692  src_->use_min_delay_ = 0;
4693  }
4694 }
4695 
4696 DiscreteEvent* NetCon::savestate_save() {
4697 // pr("savestate_save", 0, net_cvode_instance);
4698  return new NetConSave(this);
4699 }
4700 
4701 NetConSave::NetConSave(NetCon* netcon) {
4702  netcon_ = netcon;
4703 }
4704 NetConSave::~NetConSave() {}
4705 
4706 void NetConSave::savestate_restore(double tt, NetCvode* nc) {
4707 // netcon_->pr("savestate_restore", tt, nc);
4708  NrnThread* nt;
4709  if (netcon_ && netcon_->target_) {
4710  nt = PP2NT(netcon_->target_);
4711 //printf(" on thread %d\n", nt->id);
4712  }else{
4713  nt = nrn_threads;
4714  }
4715  nc->event(tt, netcon_, nt);
4716 }
4717 
4718 DiscreteEvent* NetCon::savestate_read(FILE* f) {
4719  int index;
4720  char buf[200];
4721 // fscanf(f, "%d\n", &index);
4722  nrn_assert(fgets(buf, 200, f));
4723  sscanf(buf, "%d\n", &index);
4724  NetCon* nc = NetConSave::index2netcon(index);
4725  assert(nc);
4726  return new NetConSave(nc);
4727 }
4728 
4729 void NetConSave::savestate_write(FILE* f) {
4730  fprintf(f, "%d\n", NetConType);
4731  fprintf(f, "%d\n", netcon_->obj_->index);
4732 }
4733 
4734 declareTable(NetConSaveWeightTable, void*, NetCon*)
4735 implementTable(NetConSaveWeightTable, void*, NetCon*)
4736 NetConSaveWeightTable* NetConSave::wtable_;
4737 
4738 declareTable(NetConSaveIndexTable, long, NetCon*)
4739 implementTable(NetConSaveIndexTable, long, NetCon*)
4740 NetConSaveIndexTable* NetConSave::idxtable_;
4741 
4742 void NetConSave::invalid() {
4743  if (wtable_) {
4744  delete wtable_;
4745  wtable_ = nil;
4746  }
4747  if (idxtable_) {
4748  delete idxtable_;
4749  idxtable_ = nil;
4750  }
4751 }
4752 
4753 NetCon* NetConSave::weight2netcon(double* pd) {
4754  NetCon* nc;
4755  if (!wtable_) {
4756  hoc_Item* q;
4757  Symbol* sym = hoc_lookup("NetCon");
4758  wtable_ = new NetConSaveWeightTable(2*sym->u.ctemplate->count);
4759  ITERATE (q, sym->u.ctemplate->olist) {
4760  Object* obj = OBJ(q);
4761  nc = (NetCon*)obj->u.this_pointer;
4762  if (nc->weight_) {
4763  wtable_->insert(nc->weight_, nc);
4764  }
4765  }
4766  }
4767  if (wtable_->find(nc, pd)) {
4768  assert(nc->weight_ == pd);
4769  return nc;
4770  }else{
4771  return nil;
4772  }
4773 }
4774 
4775 NetCon* NetConSave::index2netcon(long id) {
4776  NetCon* nc;
4777  if (!idxtable_) {
4778  hoc_Item* q;
4779  Symbol* sym = hoc_lookup("NetCon");
4780  idxtable_ = new NetConSaveIndexTable(2*sym->u.ctemplate->count);
4781  ITERATE (q, sym->u.ctemplate->olist) {
4782  Object* obj = OBJ(q);
4783  nc = (NetCon*)obj->u.this_pointer;
4784  if (nc->weight_) {
4785  idxtable_->insert(obj->index, nc);
4786  }
4787  }
4788  }
4789  if (idxtable_->find(nc, id)) {
4790  assert(nc->obj_->index == id);
4791  return nc;
4792  }else{
4793  return nil;
4794  }
4795 }
4796 
4797 void nrn_update_ps2nt() {
4798  net_cvode_instance->update_ps2nt();
4799 }
4800 
4801 void NetCvode::ps_thread_link(PreSyn* ps) {
4802  if (!ps) { return; }
4803  ps->nt_ = nil;
4804  if (!v_structure_change) { // PP2NT etc are correct
4805  if (ps->osrc_) {
4806  ps->nt_ = PP2NT(ob2pntproc(ps->osrc_));
4807  }else if (ps->ssrc_) {
4808  ps->nt_ = (NrnThread*)ps->ssrc_->prop->dparam[9]._pvoid;
4809  }
4810  }
4811  if (!ps->nt_) { // premature, reorder_secorder() not called yet
4812  return;
4813  }
4814  if (ps->thvar_) {
4815  int i = ps->nt_->id;
4816  if (!p[i].psl_thr_) {
4817  p[i].psl_thr_ = hoc_l_newlist();
4818  }
4819  ps->hi_th_ = hoc_l_insertvoid(p[i].psl_thr_, ps);
4820  }
4821 }
4822 
4823 void NetCvode::update_ps2nt() {
4824  int i;
4825  // first, opportunistically create p[]
4826  p_construct(nrn_nthread);
4827  // iterate over all threshold PreSyn and fill the NrnThread field
4828  hoc_Item* q;
4829  for (i=0; i < nrn_nthread; ++i) {
4830  if (p[i].psl_thr_) {
4831  hoc_l_freelist(&p[i].psl_thr_);
4832  }
4833  }
4834  if (psl_) ITERATE(q, psl_) {
4835  PreSyn* ps = (PreSyn*)VOIDITM(q);
4836  ps_thread_link(ps);
4837  }
4838 }
4839 
4840 void NetCvode::p_construct(int n) {
4841  int i;
4842  if (pcnt_ != n) {
4843  if (p) {
4844  delete [] p;
4845  p = nil;
4846  }
4847  if (n > 0) {
4848  p = new NetCvodeThreadData[n];
4849  }else{
4850  p = nil;
4851  }
4852  pcnt_ = n;
4853  }
4854  for (i=0; i < n; ++i) {
4855  p[i].unreffed_event_cnt_ = 0;
4856  }
4857 }
4858 
4859 PreSyn::PreSyn(double* src, Object* osrc, Section* ssrc) {
4860 // printf("Presyn %x %s\n", (long)this, osrc?hoc_object_name(osrc):"nil");
4861  PreSynSave::invalid();
4862  hi_index_ = -1;
4863  hi_th_ = nil;
4864  flag_ = false;
4865  valthresh_ = 0;
4866  thvar_ = src;
4867  osrc_ = osrc;
4868  ssrc_ = ssrc;
4869  threshold_ = 10.;
4870  use_min_delay_ = 0;
4871  tvec_ = nil;
4872  idvec_ = nil;
4873  stmt_ = nil;
4874  gid_ = -1;
4875  nt_ = nil;
4876  if (src) {
4877  if (osrc) {
4878  nt_ = PP2NT(ob2pntproc(osrc));
4879  }else if (ssrc) {
4880  nt_ = (NrnThread*)ssrc->prop->dparam[9]._pvoid;
4881  }
4882  }
4883  if (osrc_ && !src) {
4884  nt_ = PP2NT(ob2pntproc(osrc));
4885  }
4886 #if 1 || USENCS || NRNMPI
4887  output_index_ = -1;
4888 #endif
4889 #if BGPDMA
4890  bgp.dma_send_ = 0;
4891 #endif
4892 #if NRN_MUSIC
4893  music_port_ = 0;
4894 #endif
4895 #if DISCRETE_EVENT_OBSERVER
4896  if(thvar_) {
4897  nrn_notify_when_double_freed(thvar_, this);
4898  }else if (osrc_) {
4899  nrn_notify_when_void_freed(osrc_, this);
4900  }
4901 #endif
4902 }
4903 
4904 PreSyn::~PreSyn() {
4905  PreSynSave::invalid();
4906 // printf("~PreSyn %p\n", this);
4907  nrn_cleanup_presyn(this);
4908  if (stmt_) {
4909  delete stmt_;
4910  }
4911 #if DISCRETE_EVENT_OBSERVER
4912  if (tvec_) {
4913  ObjObservable::Detach(tvec_->obj_, this);
4914  tvec_ = nil;
4915  }
4916  if (idvec_) {
4917  ObjObservable::Detach(idvec_->obj_, this);
4918  idvec_ = nil;
4919  }
4920 #endif
4921  if (thvar_ || osrc_) {
4922 #if DISCRETE_EVENT_OBSERVER
4923  nrn_notify_pointer_disconnect(this);
4924 #endif
4925  if (!thvar_) {
4926  // even if the point process section was deleted earlier
4927  Point_process* pnt = ob2pntproc_0(osrc_);
4928  if (pnt) {
4929  pnt->presyn_ = nil;
4930  }
4931  }
4932  }
4933  for (int i=0; i < dil_.count(); ++i) {
4934  dil_.item(i)->src_ = nil;
4935  }
4936  net_cvode_instance->presyn_disconnect(this);
4937 }
4938 
4939 DiscreteEvent* PreSyn::savestate_save() {
4940 // pr("savestate_save", 0, net_cvode_instance);
4941  return new PreSynSave(this);
4942 }
4943 
4944 PreSynSave::PreSynSave(PreSyn* presyn) {
4945  presyn_ = presyn;
4946 }
4947 PreSynSave::~PreSynSave() {}
4948 
4949 void PreSynSave::savestate_restore(double tt, NetCvode* nc) {
4950 // presyn_->pr("savestate_restore", tt, nc);
4951  nc->event(tt, presyn_, presyn_->nt_);
4952 }
4953 
4954 DiscreteEvent* PreSyn::savestate_read(FILE* f) {
4955  PreSyn* ps = nil;
4956  char buf[200];
4957  int index, tid;
4958  nrn_assert(fgets(buf, 200, f));
4959  nrn_assert(sscanf(buf, "%d %d\n", &index, &tid) == 2);
4960  ps = PreSynSave::hindx2presyn(index);
4961  assert(ps);
4962  ps->nt_ = nrn_threads + tid;
4963  return new PreSynSave(ps);
4964 }
4965 
4966 void PreSynSave::savestate_write(FILE* f) {
4967  fprintf(f, "%d\n", PreSynType);
4968  fprintf(f, "%ld %d\n", presyn_->hi_index_, presyn_->nt_?presyn_->nt_->id:0);
4969 }
4970 
4971 declareTable(PreSynSaveIndexTable, long, PreSyn*)
4972 implementTable(PreSynSaveIndexTable, long, PreSyn*)
4973 PreSynSaveIndexTable* PreSynSave::idxtable_;
4974 
4975 void PreSynSave::invalid() {
4976  if (idxtable_) {
4977  delete idxtable_;
4978  idxtable_ = nil;
4979  }
4980 }
4981 
4982 PreSyn* PreSynSave::hindx2presyn(long id) {
4983  PreSyn* ps;
4984  if (!idxtable_) {
4985  hoc_Item* q;
4986  int cnt = 0;
4987  ITERATE (q, net_cvode_instance->psl_) {
4988  ++cnt;
4989  }
4990 //printf("%d PreSyn instances\n", cnt);
4991  idxtable_ = new PreSynSaveIndexTable(2*cnt);
4992  cnt = 0;
4993  ITERATE (q, net_cvode_instance->psl_) {
4994  ps = (PreSyn*)VOIDITM(q);
4995  assert(ps->hi_index_ == cnt);
4996  idxtable_->insert(ps->hi_index_, ps);
4997  ++cnt;
4998  }
4999  }
5000  if (idxtable_->find(ps, id)) {
5001  assert(ps->hi_index_ == id);
5002  return ps;
5003  }else{
5004  return nil;
5005  }
5006 }
5007 
5008 void PreSyn::init() {
5009  qthresh_ = nil;
5010  if (tvec_) {
5011  tvec_->resize(0);
5012  }
5013  if (idvec_) {
5014  idvec_->resize(0);
5015  }
5016 }
5017 
5018 void PreSyn::record_stmt(const char* stmt) {
5019  if (stmt_) {
5020  delete stmt_;
5021  stmt_ = nil;
5022  }
5023  if (strlen(stmt) > 0) {
5024  stmt_ = new HocCommand(stmt);
5025  }
5026 }
5027 
5028 void PreSyn::record_stmt(Object* pyact) {
5029  if (stmt_) {
5030  delete stmt_;
5031  stmt_ = nil;
5032  }
5033  if (pyact) {
5034  stmt_ = new HocCommand(pyact);
5035  }
5036 }
5037 
5038 void PreSyn::record(IvocVect* vec, IvocVect* idvec, int rec_id) {
5039 #if DISCRETE_EVENT_OBSERVER
5040  if (tvec_) {
5041  ObjObservable::Detach(tvec_->obj_, this);
5042  }
5043  if (idvec_) {
5044  ObjObservable::Detach(idvec_->obj_, this);
5045  }
5046 #endif
5047  tvec_ = vec;
5048  idvec_ = idvec;
5049  rec_id_ = rec_id;
5050 #if DISCRETE_EVENT_OBSERVER
5051  if (tvec_) {
5052  ObjObservable::Attach(tvec_->obj_, this);
5053  }
5054  if (idvec_) {
5055  ObjObservable::Attach(idvec_->obj_, this);
5056  tvec_->mutconstruct(1);
5057  }
5058 #endif
5059 }
5060 
5061 void PreSyn::record(double tt) {
5062  int i;
5063  if (tvec_) {
5064  // need to lock the vector if shared by other PreSyn
5065  // since we get here in the thread that manages the
5066  // threshold detection (or net_event from NET_RECEIVE).
5067  if (idvec_) {tvec_->lock();}
5068  i = tvec_->capacity();
5069  tvec_->resize_chunk(i+1);
5070  tvec_->elem(i) = tt;
5071  if (idvec_) {
5072  i = idvec_->capacity();
5073  idvec_->resize_chunk(i+1);
5074  idvec_->elem(i) = rec_id_;
5075  tvec_->unlock();
5076  }
5077  }
5078  if (stmt_) {
5079  if (nrn_nthread > 1) { nrn_hoc_lock(); }
5080  t = tt;
5081  stmt_->execute(false);
5082  if (nrn_nthread > 1) { nrn_hoc_unlock(); }
5083  }
5084 }
5085 
5086 void PreSyn::disconnect(Observable* o) {
5087 //printf("PreSyn::disconnect %s\n", hoc_object_name(((ObjObservable*)o)->object()));
5088  if (tvec_ && tvec_->obj_ == ((ObjObservable*)o)->object()) {
5089  tvec_ = nil;
5090  }
5091  if (idvec_ && idvec_->obj_ == ((ObjObservable*)o)->object()) {
5092  idvec_ = nil;
5093  }
5094  if (dil_.count() == 0 && tvec_ == nil && idvec_ == nil && output_index_ == -1) {
5095  delete this;
5096  }
5097 }
5098 
5099 void PreSyn::update(Observable* o) { // should be disconnect
5100 //printf("PreSyn::update\n");
5101  for (int i = 0; i < dil_.count(); ++i) {
5102 #if 0 // osrc_ below is invalid
5103 if (dil_.item(i)->obj_) {
5104  printf("%s disconnect from ", hoc_object_name(dil_.item(i)->obj_));
5105  printf("source %s\n", osrc_ ? hoc_object_name(osrc_) : secname(ssrc_));
5106 }
5107 #endif
5108  dil_.item(i)->src_ = nil;
5109  }
5110  if (tvec_) {
5111 #if DISCRETE_EVENT_OBSERVER
5112  ObjObservable::Detach(tvec_->obj_, this);
5113 #endif
5114  tvec_ = nil;
5115  }
5116  if (idvec_) {
5117 #if DISCRETE_EVENT_OBSERVER
5118  ObjObservable::Detach(idvec_->obj_, this);
5119 #endif
5120  idvec_ = nil;
5121  }
5122  net_cvode_instance->presyn_disconnect(this);
5123  thvar_ = nil;
5124  osrc_ = nil;
5125  delete this;
5126 }
5127 
5128 void PreSyn::update_ptr(double* pd) {
5129 #if DISCRETE_EVENT_OBSERVER
5130  nrn_notify_pointer_disconnect(this);
5131  nrn_notify_when_double_freed(pd, this);
5132 #endif
5133  thvar_ = pd;
5134 }
5135 
5136 void ConditionEvent::check(NrnThread* nt, double tt, double teps) {
5137  if (value() > 0.0) {
5138  if (flag_ == false) {
5139  flag_ = true;
5140  valthresh_ = 0.;
5141 #if USENEOSIM
5142  if (neosim_entity_) {
5143  (*p_nrn2neosim_send)(neosim_entity_, tt);
5144  }else{
5145 #endif
5146  send(tt + teps, net_cvode_instance, nt);
5147 #if USENEOSIM
5148  }
5149 #endif
5150  }
5151  }else{
5152  flag_ = false;
5153  }
5154 }
5155 
5156 ConditionEvent::ConditionEvent() {qthresh_ = NULL; valold_ = 0.0;}
5157 ConditionEvent::~ConditionEvent() {}
5158 
5159 void ConditionEvent::condition(Cvode* cv) { //logic for high order threshold detection
5160 //printf("ConditionEvent::condition f=%d t=%20.15g v=%20.15g\n", flag_, t, value());
5161  NrnThread* nt = thread();
5162  if (qthresh_) { // the threshold event has not
5163  // been handled. i.e. the cell must have retreated to
5164  // a time not later than the threshold time.
5165  assert (nt->_t <= qthresh_->t_);
5166  abandon_statistics(cv);
5167  // abandon the event
5168  STATISTICS(abandon_);
5169  net_cvode_instance->remove_event(qthresh_, nt->id);
5170  qthresh_ = nil;
5171  valthresh_ = 0.;
5172  flag_ = false;
5173  }
5174 
5175  double val = value();
5176  if (flag_ == false && val >= 0.0) { // above threshold
5177  flag_ = true;
5178  valthresh_ = 0.;
5179  if (cv->t0_ == cv->tn_) { //inited
5180  // means immediate threshold event now.
5181  // no need for qthresh since there is
5182  // no question of abandoning it so instead
5183  // of a qthresh it is a send event.
5184  STATISTICS(init_above_);
5185  send(nt->_t, net_cvode_instance, nt);
5186  }else{ // crossed somewhere in the told to t interval
5187  STATISTICS(send_qthresh_);
5188  // reset the flag_ when the value goes lower than
5189  // valold since value() when qthresh_ handled
5190  // may in fact be below 0.0
5191  valthresh_ = valold_;
5192  double th = -valold_/(val - valold_);
5193  th = th*nt->_t + (1. - th)*told_;
5194  assert(th >= cv->t0_ && th <= cv->tn_);
5195  qthresh_ = net_cvode_instance->event(th, this, nt);
5196  }
5197  }else if (flag_ == true && valold_ < valthresh_ && val < valthresh_) {
5198  // below threshold
5199  // previous step crossed in negative direction
5200  // and there was not any retreat or initialization
5201  // to give spurious crossing.
5202  flag_ = false;
5203  }
5204  valold_ = val;
5205  told_ = nt->_t;
5206 }
5207 
5208 double STECondition::value() {
5209  double val = stet_->value();
5210  return val;
5211 }
5212 
5213 void ConditionEvent::abandon_statistics(Cvode* cv) {
5214 #if 1
5215 //printf("ConditionEvent::condition %s t=%20.15g abandon event at %20.15g\n", ssrc_?secname(ssrc_):"", t, qthresh_->t_);
5216  if (nt_t == qthresh_->t_) {// it is not clear whether
5217  // this could happen and if it does it may
5218  // take fastidiousness to
5219  // an extreme
5220  STATISTICS(eq_abandon_);
5221  Printf("abandon when t == qthresh_->t_ = %20.15g\n", nt_t);
5222  }
5223  if (cv->t0_ == cv->tn_) { // inited
5224  if (value() > 0.0) { // above threshold
5225  STATISTICS(abandon_init_above_);
5226  }else{
5227  STATISTICS(abandon_init_below_);
5228  }
5229  }else{
5230  if (value() > 0.0) { // above threshold
5231  STATISTICS(abandon_above_);
5232  }else{
5233  STATISTICS(abandon_below_);
5234  }
5235  }
5236 #endif
5237 }
5238 
5239 WatchCondition::WatchCondition(Point_process* pnt, double(*c)(Point_process*))
5240  : HTList(nil)
5241 {
5242  pnt_ = pnt;
5243  c_ = c;
5244 }
5245 
5246 WatchCondition::~WatchCondition() {
5247 //printf("~WatchCondition\n");
5248  Remove();
5249 }
5250 
5251 // A WatchCondition but with different deliver
5252 STECondition::STECondition(Point_process* pnt, double(*c)(Point_process*))
5253  : WatchCondition(pnt, c)
5254 {
5255 //printf("STECondition\n");
5256 }
5257 
5258 STECondition::~STECondition() {
5259 //printf("~STECondition\n");
5260 }
5261 
5262 void WatchCondition::activate(double flag) {
5263  Cvode* cv = NULL;
5264  int id = 0;
5265  qthresh_ = nil;
5266  flag_ = (value() >= 0.) ? true: false;
5267  valthresh_ = 0.;
5268  nrflag_ = flag;
5269  if (!pnt_) { // possible for StateTransitionEvent
5270  // but only if 1 thread and no lvardt
5271  assert(nrn_nthread == 1);
5272  assert(net_cvode_instance->localstep() == false);
5273  cv = net_cvode_instance->gcv_;
5274  }else{
5275  cv = (Cvode*)pnt_->nvi_;
5276  }
5277  assert(cv);
5278  id = (cv->nctd_ > 1) ? thread()->id : 0;
5279  HTList*& wl = cv->ctd_[id].watch_list_;
5280  if (!wl) {
5281  wl = new HTList(nil);
5282  net_cvode_instance->wl_list_->append(wl);
5283  }
5284  Remove();
5285  wl->Append(this);
5286 }
5287 
5288 void WatchCondition::asf_err() {
5289 fprintf(stderr, "WATCH condition with flag=%g for %s\n",
5290  nrflag_, hoc_object_name(pnt_->ob));
5291 }
5292 
5293 void PreSyn::asf_err() {
5294 fprintf(stderr, "PreSyn threshold for %s\n", osrc_ ? hoc_object_name(osrc_):secname(ssrc_));
5295 }
5296 
5297 void WatchCondition::send(double tt, NetCvode* nc, NrnThread* nt) {
5298  qthresh_ = nc->event(tt, this, nt);
5299  STATISTICS(watch_send_);
5300 }
5301 
5302 void WatchCondition::deliver(double tt, NetCvode* ns, NrnThread* nt) {
5303  if (qthresh_) {
5304  qthresh_ = nil;
5305  STATISTICS(deliver_qthresh_);
5306  }
5307  Cvode* cv = (Cvode*)pnt_->nvi_;
5308  int type = pnt_->prop->type;
5309  if (cvode_active_ && cv) {
5310  ns->local_retreat(tt, cv);
5311  cv->set_init_flag();
5312  }else{
5313  PP2t(pnt_) = tt;
5314  }
5315  STATISTICS(watch_deliver_);
5316  POINT_RECEIVE(type, pnt_, nil, nrflag_);
5317  if (errno) {
5318  if (nrn_errno_check(type)) {
5319 hoc_warning("errno set during WatchCondition deliver to NET_RECEIVE", (char*)0);
5320  }
5321  }
5322 }
5323 
5324 void StateTransitionEvent::transition(int src, int dest,
5325  double* var1, double* var2,
5326  HocCommand* hc
5327 ){
5328  STETransition* st = states_[src].add_transition();
5329  st->dest_ = dest;
5330  st->var1_ = var1;
5331  st->var2_ = var2;
5332  st->hc_ = hc;
5333  st->ste_ = (StateTransitionEvent*)this;
5334  st->stec_ = new STECondition(pnt_, NULL);
5335  st->stec_->stet_ = st;
5336  if (st->var1_ == &t) {
5337  st->var1_is_time_ = true;
5338  }
5339 }
5340 
5341 void STETransition::activate() {
5342  if (var1_is_time_) {
5343  var1_ = &stec_->thread()->_t;
5344  }
5345  if (stec_->qthresh_) { // is it on the queue
5346  net_cvode_instance->remove_event(stec_->qthresh_, stec_->thread()->id);
5347  stec_->qthresh_ = NULL;
5348  }
5349  stec_->activate(0);
5350 }
5351 
5352 void STETransition::deactivate() {
5353  if (stec_->qthresh_) { // is it on the queue
5354  net_cvode_instance->remove_event(stec_->qthresh_, stec_->thread()->id);
5355  stec_->qthresh_ = NULL;
5356  }
5357  stec_->Remove();
5358 }
5359 
5360 void STECondition::deliver(double tt, NetCvode* ns, NrnThread* nt) {
5361  if (qthresh_) {
5362  qthresh_ = nil;
5363  STATISTICS(deliver_qthresh_);
5364  }
5365  if (!pnt_) {
5366  assert(nrn_nthread == 1 && ns->localstep() == false);
5367  if (cvode_active_) {
5368  Cvode* cv = ns->gcv_;
5369  ns->local_retreat(tt, cv);
5370  cv->set_init_flag();
5371  }else{
5372  nt->_t = tt;
5373  }
5374  }else{
5375  Cvode* cv = (Cvode*)pnt_->nvi_;
5376  if (cvode_active_ && cv) {
5377  ns->local_retreat(tt, cv);
5378  cv->set_init_flag();
5379  }else{
5380  PP2t(pnt_) = tt;
5381  }
5382  }
5383  STATISTICS(watch_deliver_);
5384  t = tt;
5385  stet_->event();
5386 }
5387 
5388 NrnThread* WatchCondition::thread() { return PP2NT(pnt_); }
5389 
5390 NrnThread* STECondition::thread() {
5391  if (pnt_) {
5392  return PP2NT(pnt_);
5393  }else{
5394  assert(nrn_nthread == 1);
5395  return nrn_threads;
5396  }
5397 }
5398 
5399 void WatchCondition::pgvts_deliver(double tt, NetCvode* ns) {
5400  NrnThread* nt;
5401  assert(0);
5402  if (qthresh_) {
5403  qthresh_ = nil;
5404  STATISTICS(deliver_qthresh_);
5405  }
5406  int type = pnt_->prop->type;
5407  STATISTICS(watch_deliver_);
5408  POINT_RECEIVE(type, pnt_, nil, nrflag_);
5409  if (errno) {
5410  if (nrn_errno_check(type)) {
5411 hoc_warning("errno set during WatchCondition deliver to NET_RECEIVE", (char*)0);
5412  }
5413  }
5414 }
5415 
5416 void STECondition::pgvts_deliver(double tt, NetCvode* ns) {
5417  NrnThread* nt;
5418  assert(0);
5419  if (qthresh_) {
5420  qthresh_ = nil;
5421  STATISTICS(deliver_qthresh_);
5422  }
5423  int type = pnt_->prop->type;
5424  STATISTICS(watch_deliver_);
5425  stet_->event();
5426  if (errno) {
5427  if (nrn_errno_check(type)) {
5428 hoc_warning("errno set during STECondition pgvts_deliver to NET_RECEIVE", (char*)0);
5429  }
5430  }
5431 }
5432 
5433 void WatchCondition::pr(const char* s, double tt, NetCvode* ns) {
5434  Printf("%s", s);
5435  Printf(" WatchCondition %s %.15g flag=%g\n", hoc_object_name(pnt_->ob), tt, nrflag_);
5436 }
5437 
5438 static Cvode* eval_cv;
5439 static void* eval_cond(NrnThread* nt) {
5440  eval_cv->evaluate_conditions(nt);
5441  return 0;
5442 }
5443 void Cvode::evaluate_conditions(NrnThread* nt) {
5444  if (!nt) {
5445  if (nrn_nthread > 1) {
5446  eval_cv = this;
5447  nrn_multithread_job(eval_cond);
5448  return;
5449  }
5450  nt = nrn_threads;
5451  }
5452  CvodeThreadData& z = CTD(nt->id);
5453  int i;
5454  if (z.psl_th_) {
5455  for (i = z.psl_th_->count()-1; i >= 0; --i) {
5456  z.psl_th_->item(i)->condition( this);
5457  }
5458  }
5459  if (z.watch_list_) {
5460  for (HTList* item = z.watch_list_->First(); item != z.watch_list_->End(); item = item->Next()) {
5461  ((WatchCondition*)item)->condition(this);
5462  }
5463  }
5464 }
5465 
5466 static void* chk_deliv(NrnThread* nt) {
5467  eval_cv->check_deliver(nt);
5468  return 0;
5469 }
5470 void Cvode::check_deliver(NrnThread* nt) {
5471  if (!nt) {
5472  if (nrn_nthread > 1) {
5473  eval_cv = this;
5474  nrn_multithread_job(chk_deliv);
5475  return;
5476  }
5477  nt = nrn_threads;
5478  }
5479  CvodeThreadData& z = CTD(nt->id);
5480  int i;
5481  if (z.psl_th_) {
5482  for (i = z.psl_th_->count()-1; i >= 0; --i) {
5483  z.psl_th_->item(i)->check(nt, nt->_t);
5484  }
5485  }
5486  if (z.watch_list_) {
5487  for (HTList* item = z.watch_list_->First(); item != z.watch_list_->End(); item = item->Next()) {
5488  ((WatchCondition*)item)->check(nt, nt->_t);
5489  }
5490  }
5491 }
5492 
5493 void NetCvode::fixed_record_continuous(NrnThread* nt) {
5494  int i, cnt;
5495  nrn_ba(nt, BEFORE_STEP);
5496  cnt = fixed_record_->count();
5497  for (i=0; i < cnt; ++i) { // should be made more efficient
5498  PlayRecord* pr = fixed_record_->item(i);
5499  if (pr->ith_ == nt->id) {
5500  pr->continuous(nt->_t);
5501  }
5502  }
5503 }
5504 
5505 void NetCvode::fixed_play_continuous(NrnThread* nt) {
5506  int i, cnt;
5507  cnt = fixed_play_->count();
5508  for (i=0; i < cnt; ++i) {
5509  PlayRecord* pr = fixed_play_->item(i);
5510  if (pr->ith_ == nt->id) {
5511  pr->continuous(nt->_t);
5512  }
5513  }
5514 }
5515 
5516 // nrnthread_get_trajectory_requests helper for buffered trajectories
5517 // also for per time step return (no Vector and varrays is NULL)
5518 // if bsize > 0 then vectors need to be at least that size
5519 // However determination of whether to do per time step return or buffering
5520 // can be specified on the NEURON side.
5521 static int trajec_buffered(NrnThread& nt, int bsize, IvocVect* v, double* pd,
5522  int i_pr, PlayRecord* pr, void** vpr,
5523  int i_trajec, int* types, int* indices, double** pvars, double** varrays)
5524 {
5525  int err = 0; //success
5526  if (bsize > 0) {
5527  if (v->buffer_size() < bsize) {
5528  v->buffer_size(bsize);
5529  }
5530  varrays[i_trajec] = vector_vec(v);
5531  }else{
5532  pvars[i_trajec] = pd;
5533  }
5534  vpr[i_pr] = pr;
5535  if (pd == &nt._t) {
5536  types[i_trajec] = 0;
5537  indices[i_trajec] = 0;
5538  }else{
5539  err = nrn_dblpntr2nrncore(pd, nt, types[i_trajec], indices[i_trajec]);
5540  if (err) {
5541  Fprintf(stderr, "Pointer %p of PlayRecord type %d ignored because not a Range Variable",
5542  pd, pr->type());
5543  }
5544  }
5545  return err;
5546 }
5547 
5548 // Transfer of trajectories from CoreNEURON to NEURON.
5549 // bsize == 0: Most flexible interactivity, transfer on a per time step basis.
5550 // bsize > 0: Greatest performance, fill the entire trajectory arrays on
5551 // the CoreNEURON side and transferring at the end of a CoreNEURON run.
5552 // Here, we ensure the arrays have at least bsize size (i.e. at least tstop/dt)
5553 // and CoreNEURON will start filling from the beginning of the arrays.
5554 // n_pr refers the the number of PlayRecord instances in the vpr array.
5555 // n_trajec refers to the number of trajectories to be recorded on the
5556 // CoreNEURON side and is the size of the types, indices, and varrays.
5557 // n_pr is different from n_trajec when one of the GLineRecord instances has
5558 // a gl_->name that is an expression that contains several range variables.
5559 // Per time step transfer now uses pvars so CoreNEURON scatters values
5560 // to pvars instead of collecting in double array.
5561 void nrnthread_get_trajectory_requests(int tid, int& bsize,
5562 int& n_pr, void**& vpr,
5563 int& n_trajec, int*& types, int*& indices, double**& pvars, double**& varrays) {
5564  if (bsize > 0) { // but would NEURON rather use per time step mode
5565  if (nrn_trajectory_request_per_time_step_) {
5566  bsize = 0;
5567  }
5568  }
5569  n_pr = 0;
5570  n_trajec = 0;
5571  types = NULL;
5572  indices = NULL;
5573  vpr = NULL;
5574  varrays = NULL;
5575  pvars = NULL;
5576  if (tid < nrn_nthread) {
5577  NrnThread& nt = nrn_threads[tid];
5578  PlayRecList* fr = net_cvode_instance->fixed_record_;
5579  int cntp;
5580  cntp = fr->count();
5581  // allocate
5582  for (int i=0; i < cntp; ++i) {
5583  PlayRecord* pr = fr->item(i);
5584  if (pr->ith_ == tid) {
5585  if (pr->type() == TvecRecordType || pr->type() == YvecRecordType) {
5586  n_pr++;
5587  n_trajec++;
5588 #if HAVE_IV
5589  }else if (pr->type() == GLineRecordType) {
5590  n_pr++;
5591  if (pr->pd_ == NULL) {
5592  GLineRecord* glr = (GLineRecord*)pr;
5593  assert(glr->gl_->expr_);
5594  glr->fill_pd();
5595  if (pr->pd_) {
5596  n_trajec++;
5597  }else{
5598  n_trajec += glr->pd_and_vec_.size();
5599  }
5600  }else{
5601  n_trajec++;
5602  }
5603  }else if (pr->type() == GVectorRecordType) {
5604  GVectorRecord* gvr = (GVectorRecord*)pr;
5605  if (gvr->count()) {
5606  bsize = 0;
5607  n_pr++;
5608  for (int j=0; j < gvr->count(); ++j) {
5609  if (gvr->pdata(j)) {
5610  n_trajec++;
5611  }
5612  }
5613  }
5614 #endif // HAVE_IV
5615  }
5616  }
5617  }
5618  if (n_pr == 0) {
5619  return;
5620  }
5621  vpr = new void*[n_pr];
5622  types = new int[n_trajec];
5623  indices = new int[n_trajec];
5624  if (bsize > 0) {
5625  varrays = new double*[n_trajec];
5626  }else{
5627  pvars = new double*[n_trajec];
5628  } // if both varrays and pvars are NULL then CoreNEURON will return values every time step
5629  // everything allocated, start over and fill
5630  n_pr = 0;
5631  n_trajec = 0;
5632  for (int i=0; i < cntp; ++i) {
5633  int err = 0;
5634  PlayRecord* pr = fr->item(i);
5635  if (pr->ith_ == tid) {
5636  if (1) { // buffered or per time step value return
5637  IvocVect* v = NULL;
5638  if (pr->type() == TvecRecordType) {
5639  v = ((TvecRecord*)pr)->t_;
5640  err = trajec_buffered(nt, bsize, v, &nt._t, n_pr++, pr, vpr, n_trajec++, types, indices, pvars, varrays);
5641  if (err) { n_pr--; n_trajec--; }
5642  }else if (pr->type() == YvecRecordType) {
5643  v = ((YvecRecord*)pr)->y_;
5644  err = trajec_buffered(nt, bsize, v, pr->pd_, n_pr++, pr, vpr, n_trajec++, types, indices, pvars, varrays);
5645  if (err) { n_pr--; n_trajec--; }
5646 #if HAVE_IV
5647  }else if (pr->type() == GLineRecordType) {
5648  GLineRecord* glr = (GLineRecord*)pr;
5649  if (pr->pd_) { // glr->gl_->name is an expression resolved to a double*
5650  if (bsize && !glr->v_) {
5651  glr->v_ = new IvocVect(bsize);
5652  }
5653  v = glr->v_;
5654  err = trajec_buffered(nt, bsize, v, pr->pd_, n_pr++, pr, vpr, n_trajec++, types, indices, pvars, varrays);
5655  if (err) { n_pr--; n_trajec--; }
5656  }else{ // glr->gl_->name expression involves several range variables
5657  GLineRecordEData& ed = glr->pd_and_vec_;
5658  int n = n_trajec;
5659  for (GLineRecordEData::iterator it = ed.begin(); it != ed.end(); ++it) {
5660  double* pd = (*it).first;
5661  assert(pd);
5662  v = (*it).second;
5663  if (bsize && v == NULL) {
5664  v = (*it).second = new IvocVect(bsize);
5665  }
5666  err = trajec_buffered(nt, bsize, v, pd, n_pr, pr, vpr, n_trajec++, types, indices, pvars, varrays);
5667  if (err) { break; }
5668  }
5669  n_pr++;
5670  if (err) { // single error removes entire GLineRecord
5671  n_pr--;
5672  n_trajec = n;
5673  }
5674  }
5675  }else if (pr->type() == GVectorRecordType) {
5676  GVectorRecord* gvr = (GVectorRecord*)pr;
5677  if (gvr->count()) {
5678  int n = n_trajec;
5679  for (int j=0; j < gvr->count(); ++j) {
5680  if (gvr->pdata(j)) {
5681  err = trajec_buffered(nt, bsize, NULL, gvr->pdata(j), n_pr, pr, vpr, n_trajec++, types, indices, pvars, varrays);
5682  if (err) { break; }
5683  }
5684  }
5685  n_pr++;
5686  if (err) { // single error removes entire GVectorRecord
5687  n_pr--;
5688  n_trajec = n;
5689  }
5690  }
5691 #endif // HAVE_IV
5692  }
5693  }
5694  }
5695  if (n_trajec == 0) { // if errors reduced to 0, clean up
5696  assert(n_pr == 0);
5697  if (types) { delete [] types; types = NULL; }
5698  if (indices) { delete [] indices; indices = NULL; }
5699  if (vpr) { delete [] vpr; vpr = NULL; }
5700  if (varrays) { delete [] varrays; varrays = NULL; }
5701  if (pvars) { delete [] pvars; pvars = NULL; }
5702  }
5703  }
5704 #if 0
5705  printf("nrnthread_get_trajectory_requests tid=%d bsize=%d n_pr=%d n_trajec=%d\n", tid, bsize, n_pr, n_trajec);
5706  int i_trajec = 0;
5707  double* pd;
5708  for (int i=0; i < n_pr; ++i) {
5709  PlayRecord* pr = (PlayRecord*)vpr[i];
5710  pd = pr->pd_;
5711  if (pd) {
5712  printf(" %d %d prtype=%d %p type=%d index=%d\n", i, i_trajec, pr->type(), pd, types[i_trajec], indices[i_trajec]);
5713  i_trajec++;
5714  }else{
5715  assert(pr->type() == GLineRecordType);
5716  GLineRecord* glr = (GLineRecord*)pr;
5717  GLineRecordEData& ed = glr->pd_and_vec_;
5718  i_trajec += ed.size();
5719  }
5720  }
5721 #endif
5722  }
5723 }
5724 
5725 void nrnthread_trajectory_values(int tid, int n_pr, void** vpr, double tt){ //, int n_trajec, double* values) {
5726  if (tid < 0) {
5727  net_cvode_instance->record_init();
5728  return;
5729  }
5730  if (tid < nrn_nthread) {
5731 #if HAVE_IV
5732  ObjectContext obc(NULL); // in case GLineRecord with expression.
5733 #endif // HAVE_IV
5734  nrn_threads[tid]._t = tt;
5735  if (tid == 0) { t = tt; }
5736  int i_trajec = 0;
5737  int flush = 0;
5738  for (int i=0; i < n_pr; ++i) {
5739  PlayRecord* pr = (PlayRecord*)vpr[i];
5740  pr->continuous(tt);
5741 #if HAVE_IV
5742  if (pr->type() == GVectorRecordType) { // see the movie
5743  flush = 1;
5744  }
5745  }
5746  if (flush) {
5747  Oc oc;
5748  oc.run("screen_update()\n");
5749  }
5750  obc.restore();
5751 #else
5752  }
5753 #endif // HAVE_IV
5754  }
5755 }
5756 
5757 // CoreNEURON received pointers to the data of each Vector (resized so that
5758 // the data is long enough to hold the trajectory (tstop/dt). On calling
5759 // this, each Vector needs only be resized to the actual vecsz.
5760 // Note that we have not bothered to fill the variables on the hoc side with
5761 // the last values, though we did fill t.
5762 // In the case where glr->pd_ = NULL, the GraphLine is an expression that
5763 // cannot be interpreted as a pointer and the expression involves one or
5764 // more range variables that individually were resolved into pointers. In
5765 // this case in glr->plot, the relevant Vector elements are copied into those
5766 // pointers and the expression is then evaluated and plotted.
5767 void nrnthread_trajectory_return(int tid, int n_pr, int vecsz, void** vpr, double tt) {
5768  if (tid < 0) {
5769  net_cvode_instance->record_init();
5770  return;
5771  }
5772  if (tid < nrn_nthread) {
5773  nrn_threads[tid]._t = tt;
5774  if (tid == 0) { t = tt; }
5775  for (int i=0; i < n_pr; ++i) {
5776  PlayRecord* pr = (PlayRecord*)vpr[i];
5777  IvocVect* v = NULL;
5778  if (pr->type() == TvecRecordType) {
5779  v = ((TvecRecord*)pr)->t_;
5780  assert(v->buffer_size() >= vecsz);
5781  ((ParentVect*)v)->resize(vecsz); // do not zero
5782  }else if (pr->type() == YvecRecordType) {
5783  v = ((YvecRecord*)pr)->y_;
5784  assert(v->buffer_size() >= vecsz);
5785  ((ParentVect*)v)->resize(vecsz); // do not zero
5786 #if HAVE_IV
5787  }else if (pr->type() == GLineRecordType) {
5788  GLineRecord* glr = (GLineRecord*)pr;
5789  glr->plot(vecsz, tt);
5790 #endif // HAVE_IV
5791  }else{
5792  assert(0);
5793  }
5794  }
5795  }
5796 }
5797 
5798 // factored this out from deliver_net_events so we can
5799 // stay in the cache
5800 void NetCvode::check_thresh(NrnThread* nt) { // for default method
5801  int i;
5802 
5803  hoc_Item* pth = p[nt->id].psl_thr_;
5804 
5805  if (pth) { /* only look at ones with a threshold */
5806  hoc_Item* q1;
5807  ITERATE(q1, pth) {
5808  PreSyn* ps = (PreSyn*)VOIDITM(q1);
5809  // only the ones for this thread
5810  if (ps->nt_ == nt) {
5811  if (ps->thvar_) {
5812  ps->check(nt, nt->_t, 1e-10);
5813  }
5814  }
5815  }
5816  }
5817  for (i=0; i < wl_list_->count(); ++i) {
5818  HTList* wl = wl_list_->item(i);
5819  for (HTList* item = wl->First(); item != wl->End(); item = item->Next()) {
5820  WatchCondition* wc = (WatchCondition*)item;
5821  NrnThread* nt1 = wc->pnt_ ? PP2NT(wc->pnt_) : nrn_threads;
5822  if (nt1 == nt) {
5823  wc->check(nt, nt->_t);
5824  }
5825  }
5826  }
5827 }
5828 
5829 void NetCvode::deliver_net_events(NrnThread* nt) { // for default method
5830  TQItem* q;
5831  double tm, tt, tsav;
5832 #if BGPDMA
5833  if (use_bgpdma_) { nrnbgp_messager_advance(); }
5834 #endif
5835  int tid = nt->id;
5836  tsav = nt->_t;
5837  tm = nt->_t + 0.5*nt->_dt;
5838 #if BBTQ == 5
5839  tryagain:
5840  // one of the events on the main queue may be a NetParEvent
5841  // which due to dt round off error can result in an event
5842  // placed on the bin queue to be delivered now, which
5843  // can put 0 delay events on to the main queue. So loop til
5844  // no events. The alternative would be to deliver an idt=0 event
5845  // immediately but that would very much change the sequence
5846  // with respect to what is being done here and it is unclear
5847  // how to fix the value of t there. This can be a do while loop
5848  // but I do not want to affect the case of not using a bin queue.
5849 
5850  if (nrn_use_bin_queue_) {
5851  while ((q = p[tid].tqe_->dequeue_bin()) != 0) {
5852  DiscreteEvent* db = (DiscreteEvent*)q->data_;
5853 #if PRINT_EVENT
5854 if (print_event_) {db->pr("binq deliver", nt_t, this);}
5855 #endif
5856  p[tid].tqe_->release(q);
5857  db->deliver(nt->_t, this, nt);
5858  }
5859 // assert(int(tm/nt->_dt)%1000 == p[tid].tqe_->nshift_);
5860  }
5861 #endif
5862 
5863  deliver_events(tm, nt);
5864 
5865 #if BBTQ == 5
5866  if (nrn_use_bin_queue_) {
5867  if (p[tid].tqe_->top()) { goto tryagain; }
5868  p[tid].tqe_->shift_bin(tm);
5869  }
5870 #endif
5871  nt->_t = tsav;
5872 }
5873 
5874 implementPtrList(PlayRecList,PlayRecord)
5875 
5876 void NetCvode::playrec_add(PlayRecord* pr) { // called by PlayRecord constructor
5877 //printf("NetCvode::playrec_add %p\n", pr);
5878  playrec_change_cnt_ = 0;
5879  prl_->append(pr);
5880 }
5881 
5882 void NetCvode::playrec_remove(PlayRecord* pr) { // called by PlayRecord destructor
5883 //printf("NetCvode::playrec_remove %p\n", pr);
5884  playrec_change_cnt_ = 0;
5885  int i, cnt = prl_->count();
5886  for (i=0; i < cnt; ++i) {
5887  if (prl_->item(i) == pr) {
5888  prl_->remove(i);
5889  break;
5890  }
5891  }
5892  cnt = fixed_play_->count();
5893  for (i=0; i < cnt; ++i) {
5894  if (fixed_play_->item(i) == pr) {
5895  fixed_play_->remove(i);
5896  break;
5897  }
5898  }
5899  cnt = fixed_record_->count();
5900  for (i=0; i < cnt; ++i) {
5901  if (fixed_record_->item(i) == pr) {
5902  fixed_record_->remove(i);
5903  break;
5904  }
5905  }
5906 }
5907 
5908 int NetCvode::playrec_item(PlayRecord* pr) {
5909  int i, cnt = prl_->count();
5910  for (i=0; i < cnt; ++i) {
5911  if (prl_->item(i) == pr) {
5912  return i;
5913  }
5914  }
5915  return -1;
5916 }
5917 
5918 PlayRecord* NetCvode::playrec_item(int i) {
5919  assert(i < prl_->count());
5920  return prl_->item(i);
5921 }
5922 
5923 PlayRecord* NetCvode::playrec_uses(void* v) {
5924  int i, cnt = prl_->count();
5925  for (i=0; i < cnt; ++i) {
5926  if (prl_->item(i)->uses(v)) {
5927  return prl_->item(i);
5928  }
5929  }
5930  return nil;
5931 }
5932 
5933 PlayRecord::PlayRecord(double* pd, Object* ppobj) {
5934 //printf("PlayRecord::PlayRecord %p\n", this);
5935  pd_ = pd;
5936  cvode_ = nil;
5937  ith_ = 0;
5938  if (pd_) {
5939  nrn_notify_when_double_freed(pd_, this);
5940  }
5941  ppobj_ = ppobj;
5942  if (ppobj_) {
5943  ObjObservable::Attach(ppobj_, this);
5944  }
5945  net_cvode_instance->playrec_add(this);
5946 }
5947 
5948 PlayRecord::~PlayRecord() {
5949 //printf("PlayRecord::~PlayRecord %p\n", this);
5950  nrn_notify_pointer_disconnect(this);
5951  if (ppobj_) {
5952  ObjObservable::Detach(ppobj_, this);
5953  }
5954  net_cvode_instance->playrec_remove(this);
5955 }
5956 
5957 void PlayRecord::update_ptr(double* pd) {
5958  nrn_notify_pointer_disconnect(this);
5959  nrn_notify_when_double_freed(pd, this);
5960  pd_ = pd;
5961 }
5962 
5963 void PlayRecord::disconnect(Observable*) {
5964 //printf("PlayRecord::disconnect %ls\n", (long)this);
5965  delete this;
5966 }
5967 
5968 void PlayRecord::record_add(Cvode* cv) {
5969  cvode_ = cv;
5970  if (cv) {
5971  cv->record_add(this);
5972  }
5973  net_cvode_instance->fixed_record_->append(this);
5974 }
5975 
5976 void PlayRecord::play_add(Cvode* cv) {
5977  cvode_ = cv;
5978  if (cv) {
5979  cv->play_add(this);
5980  }
5981  net_cvode_instance->fixed_play_->append(this);
5982 }
5983 
5984 void PlayRecord::pr() {
5985  Printf("PlayRecord\n");
5986 }

5991  ObjObservable::Attach(t_->obj_, this);
5992 }
5993

5997 }

6000 // printf("%s TvecRecord disconnect\n", hoc_object_name(t_->obj_));
6001  delete this;
6002 }
6003 
6004 void TvecRecord::install(Cvode* cv) {
6005  record_add(cv);
6006 }
6007 
6008 void TvecRecord::record_init() {
6009  t_->resize(0);
6010 }
6011 
6012 void TvecRecord::continuous(double tt) {
6013  int j = t_->capacity();
6014  t_->resize_chunk(j + 1);
6015  t_->elem(j) = tt;
6016 }

6042 void YvecRecord::continuous(double tt) {

6045  y_->elem(j) = *pd_;
6046 }

6048 VecRecordDiscrete::VecRecordDiscrete(double* pd, IvocVect* y, IvocVect* t, Object* ppobj) : PlayRecord(pd, ppobj) {
6049 //printf("VecRecordDiscrete\n");
6050  y_ = y;
6051  t_ = t;
6052  ObjObservable::Attach(y_->obj_, this);
6053  ObjObservable::Attach(t_->obj_, this);
6054  e_ = new PlayRecordEvent();
6055  e_->plr_ = this;
6056 }
6057 
6058 VecRecordDiscrete::~VecRecordDiscrete() {
6059 //printf("~VecRecordDiscrete\n");
6060  ObjObservable::Detach(y_->obj_, this);
6061  ObjObservable::Detach(t_->obj_, this);
6062  delete e_;
6063 }
6064 
6065 PlayRecordSave* VecRecordDiscrete::savestate_save() {
6066  return new VecRecordDiscreteSave(this);
6067 }
6068 
6069 VecRecordDiscreteSave::VecRecordDiscreteSave(PlayRecord* prl) : PlayRecordSave(prl) {
6070  cursize_ = ((VecRecordDiscrete*)pr_)->y_->capacity();
6071 }
6072 VecRecordDiscreteSave::~VecRecordDiscreteSave() {
6073 }
6074 void VecRecordDiscreteSave::savestate_restore() {
6075  check();
6076  VecRecordDiscrete* vrd = (VecRecordDiscrete*)pr_;
6077  vrd->y_->resize(cursize_);
6078  assert(cursize_ <= vrd->t_->capacity());
6079 }
6080 void VecRecordDiscreteSave::savestate_write(FILE* f) {
6081  fprintf(f, "%d\n", cursize_);
6082 }
6083 void VecRecordDiscreteSave::savestate_read(FILE* f) {
6084  char buf[100];
6085  nrn_assert(fgets(buf, 100, f));
6086  nrn_assert(sscanf(buf, "%d\n", &cursize_) == 1);
6087 }
6088 
6089 void VecRecordDiscrete::disconnect(Observable*) {
6090 // printf("%s VecRecordDiscrete disconnect\n", hoc_object_name(y_->obj_));
6091  delete this;
6092 }
6093 
6094 void VecRecordDiscrete::install(Cvode* cv) {
6095  record_add(cv);
6096 }
6097 
6098 void VecRecordDiscrete::record_init() {
6099  y_->resize(0);
6100  if (t_->capacity() > 0) {
6101  e_->send(t_->elem(0), net_cvode_instance, nrn_threads);
6102  }
6103 }
6104 
6105 void VecRecordDiscrete::frecord_init(TQItem* q) {
6106  record_init_items_->append(q);
6107 }
6108 
6109 void VecRecordDiscrete::deliver(double tt, NetCvode* nc) {
6110  int j = y_->capacity();
6111  y_->resize_chunk(j + 1);
6112  y_->elem(j) = *pd_;
6113  assert(Math::equal(t_->elem(j), tt, 1e-8));
6114  if (j+1 < t_->capacity()) {
6115  e_->send(t_->elem(j+1), nc, nrn_threads);
6116  }
6117 }
6118 
6119 VecRecordDt::VecRecordDt(double* pd, IvocVect* y, double dt, Object* ppobj) : PlayRecord(pd, ppobj) {

6122  dt_ = dt;
6123  ObjObservable::Attach(y_->obj_, this);
6124  e_ = new PlayRecordEvent();
6125  e_->plr_ = this;
6126 }
