6161  record_init_items_->append(q);
6162 }
6163 
6164 void VecRecordDt::deliver(double tt, NetCvode* nc) {
6165  int j = y_->capacity();
6166  y_->resize_chunk(j + 1);
6167  if (pd_ == &t) {
6168  y_->elem(j) = tt;
6169  }else{
6170  y_->elem(j) = *pd_;
6171  }
6172  e_->send(tt + dt_, nc, nrn_threads);
6173 }
6174 
6175 void NetCvode::vecrecord_add() {
6176  double* pd = hoc_pgetarg(1);
6177  consist_sec_pd("Cvode.record", chk_access(), pd);
6178  IvocVect* y = vector_arg(2);
6179  IvocVect* t = vector_arg(3);
6180  PlayRecord* pr = playrec_uses(y);
6181  if (pr) {
6182  delete pr;
6183  }
6184  bool discrete = ( (ifarg(4) && (int)chkarg(4,0,1) == 1) ? true : false);
6185  if (discrete) {
6186  pr = new VecRecordDiscrete(pd, y, t);
6187  }else{
6188  pr = playrec_uses(t);
6189  if (pr) {
6190  delete pr;
6191  }
6192  pr = new TvecRecord(chk_access(), t);
6193  pr = new YvecRecord(pd, y);
6194  }
6195 }
6196 
6197 void NetCvode::vec_remove() {
6198  IvocVect* iv = vector_arg(1);
6199  PlayRecord* pr;
6200  while((pr = playrec_uses(vector_arg(1))) != nil) {
6201  delete pr;
6202  }
6203 }
6204 
6205 void NetCvode::playrec_setup() {
6206  long i, j, iprl, prlc;
6207  double* px;
6208  prlc = prl_->count();
6209  fixed_record_->remove_all();
6210  fixed_play_->remove_all();
6211  if (gcv_) {
6212  gcv_->delete_prl();
6213  }else{
6214  lvardtloop(i, j) {
6215  p[i].lcv_[j].delete_prl();
6216  }
6217  }
6218  for (iprl = 0; iprl < prlc; ++iprl) {
6219  PlayRecord* pr = prl_->item(iprl);
6220  bool b = false;
6221  if (single_) {
6222  pr->install(gcv_);
6223  b = true;
6224  }else{
6225  if (pr->ppobj_ && ob2pntproc(pr->ppobj_)->nvi_) {
6226  pr->install((Cvode*)ob2pntproc(pr->ppobj_)->nvi_);
6227  b = true;
6228  }else{
6229  lvardtloop(i, j) {
6230  Cvode& cv= p[i].lcv_[j];
6231  if (cv.is_owner(pr->pd_)) {
6232  pr->install(&cv);
6233  b = true;
6234  break;
6235  }
6236  }
6237  }
6238  }
6239  if (b == false) {
6240 hoc_execerror("We were unable to associate a PlayRecord item with a RANGE variable", nil);
6241  }
6242  // and need to know the thread owners
6243  if (pr->ppobj_) {
6244  i = PP2NT(ob2pntproc(pr->ppobj_))->id;
6245  }else{
6246  i = owned_by_thread(pr->pd_);
6247  }
6248  if (i < 0) {
6249 hoc_execerror("We were unable to associate a PlayRecord item with a thread", nil);
6250  }
6251  pr->ith_ = i;
6252  }
6253  playrec_change_cnt_ = structure_change_cnt_;
6254 }
6255 
6256 bool Cvode::is_owner(double* pd) { // is a pointer to range variable in this cell
6257  int in, it;
6258  for (it=0; it < nrn_nthread; ++it) {
6259  CvodeThreadData& z = CTD(it);
6260  for (in=0; in < z.v_node_count_; ++in) {
6261  Node* nd = z.v_node_[in];
6262  if (&NODEV(nd) == pd) {
6263  return true;
6264  }
6265  Prop* p;
6266  for (p = nd->prop; p; p = p->next) {
6267  if (pd >= p->param && pd < (p->param + p->param_size)) {
6268  return true;
6269  }
6270  }
6271  if (nd->extnode) {
6272  if (pd >= nd->extnode->v && pd < (nd->extnode->v + nlayer)) {
6273  return true;
6274  }
6275  }
6276  // will need to check the linear mechanisms when there is a cvode
6277  // specific list of them and IDA is allowed for local step method.
6278  }
6279  if (nth_) { break;} // lvardt
6280  }
6281  return false;
6282 }
6283 
6284 int NetCvode::owned_by_thread(double* pd) {
6285  if (nrn_nthread == 1) { return 0; }
6286  int in, it;
6287  for (it = 0; it < nrn_nthread; ++it) {
6288  NrnThread& nt = nrn_threads[it];
6289  int i1 = 0;
6290  int i3 = nt.end;
6291  for (in=i1; in < i3; ++in) {
6292  Node* nd = nt._v_node[in];
6293  if (&NODEV(nd) == pd) {
6294  return it;
6295  }
6296  Prop* p;
6297  for (p = nd->prop; p; p = p->next) {
6298  if (pd >= p->param && pd < (p->param + p->param_size)) {
6299  return it;
6300  }
6301  }
6302  if (nd->extnode) {
6303  if (pd >= nd->extnode->v && pd < (nd->extnode->v + nlayer)) {
6304  return it;
6305  }
6306  }
6307  // will need to check the line mechanisms when there is a cvode
6308  // specific list of them and IDA is allowed for local step method.
6309  }
6310  }
6311  return -1;
6312 }
6313 
6314 void NetCvode::consist_sec_pd(const char* msg, Section* sec, double* pd) {
6315  int in;
6316  Node* nd;
6317  for (in=-1; in < sec->nnode; ++in) {
6318  if (in == -1) {
6319  nd = sec->parentnode; // in case &v(0)
6320  if (!nd) { continue; }
6321  }else{
6322  nd = sec->pnode[in];
6323  }
6324  if (&NODEV(nd) == pd) {
6325  return;
6326  }
6327  Prop* p;
6328  for (p = nd->prop; p; p = p->next) {
6329  if (pd >= p->param && pd < (p->param + p->param_size)) {
6330  return;
6331  }
6332  }
6333  if (nd->extnode) {
6334  if (pd >= nd->extnode->v && pd < (nd->extnode->v + nlayer)) {
6335  return;
6336  }
6337  }
6338  // will need to check the linear mechanisms when there is a cvode
6339  // specific list of them and IDA is allowed for local step method.
6340  }
6341  hoc_execerror(msg, " pointer not associated with currently accessed section\n\
6342 Use section ... (&var(x)...) intead of ...(&section.var(x)...)\n");
6343 }
6344 
6345 double NetCvode::state_magnitudes() {
6346  int i, j;
6347  if (hoc_is_double_arg(1)) {
6348  int on = (int)chkarg(1, 0, 2);
6349  int i;
6350  if (on == 2) {
6351  maxstate_analyse();
6352  }else{
6353  if (gcv_) {
6354  gcv_->activate_maxstate(on?true:false);
6355  }else{
6356  lvardtloop(i, j) {
6357  p[i].lcv_[j].activate_maxstate(on?true:false);
6358  }
6359  }
6360  }
6361  return 0.;
6362  }else if (hoc_is_str_arg(1)) {
6363  Symbol* sym = name2sym(gargstr(1));
6364  double dummy;
6365  double* pamax = &dummy;
6366  if (ifarg(2)) {
6367  pamax = hoc_pgetarg(2);
6368  }
6369  return maxstate_analyse(sym, pamax);
6370  }else{
6371  int i, j, n;
6372  Vect* v = vector_arg(1);
6373  if (!cvode_active_){
6374  v->resize(0);
6375  return 0.;
6376  }
6377  double* vp;
6378  double* ms;
6379  n = 0;
6380  if (gcv_) {
6381  n += gcv_->neq_;
6382  }else{
6383  lvardtloop(i, j) {
6384  n += p[i].lcv_[j].neq_;
6385  }
6386  }
6387  v->resize(n);
6388  vp = vector_vec(v);
6389  int getacor = 0;
6390  if (ifarg(2)) {
6391  getacor = (int)chkarg(2, 0, 1);
6392  }
6393  j = 0;
6394  if (gcv_) {
6395  if (gcv_->maxstate_) {
6396  if (getacor) {
6397  gcv_->maxacor(vp);
6398  }else{
6399  gcv_->maxstate(vp);
6400  }
6401  }
6402  }else{
6403  lvardtloop(i, j) {
6404  Cvode& cv = p[i].lcv_[j];
6405  if (cv.maxstate_) {
6406  if (getacor) {
6407  cv.maxacor(vp+j);
6408  }else{
6409  cv.maxstate(vp+j);
6410  }
6411  }
6412  j += cv.neq_;
6413  }
6414  }
6415  return 0.;
6416  }
6417 }
6418 void NetCvode::maxstate_analyze_1(int it, Cvode& cv, MaxStateItem* msi, CvodeThreadData& z) {
6419  int j, n;
6420  Symbol* sym;
6421  double* ms;
6422  double* ma;
6423  n = z.nvsize_;
6424  ms = cv.n_vector_data(cv.maxstate_, it);
6425  ma = cv.n_vector_data(cv.maxacor_, it);
6426  for (j=0; j < n; ++j) {
6427  sym = hdp_->retrieve_sym(z.pv_[j]);
6428  if (!mst_->find(msi, (void*)sym)) {
6429  msi = new MaxStateItem();
6430  msi->sym_ = sym;
6431  msi->max_ = -1e9;
6432  msi->amax_ = -1e9;
6433  mst_->insert((void*)sym, msi);
6434  }
6435  if (msi->max_ < ms[j]) { msi->max_ = ms[j];}
6436  if (msi->amax_ < ma[j]) { msi->amax_ = ma[j];}
6437  }
6438 }
6439 
6440 void NetCvode::maxstate_analyse() {
6441  int i, it, j, n;
6442  MaxStateItem* msi;
6443  Symbol* sym;
6444  if (!mst_) {
6445  int n = 0;
6446  for (sym = hoc_built_in_symlist->first; sym; sym = sym->next) {
6447  ++n;
6448  }
6449  mst_ = new MaxStateTable(3*n);
6450  }
6451  {for (TableIterator(MaxStateTable) ti(*mst_); ti.more(); ti.next()) {
6452  msi = ti.cur_value();
6453  msi->max_ = -1e9;
6454  msi->amax_ = -1e9;
6455  }}
6456  if (empty_) { return; }
6457  statename(0,2);
6458  if (gcv_) {
6459  for (it=0; it < nrn_nthread; ++it) {
6460  maxstate_analyze_1(it, *gcv_, msi, gcv_->ctd_[it]);
6461  }
6462  }else{
6463  lvardtloop(i, j) {
6464  Cvode& cv = p[i].lcv_[j];
6465  maxstate_analyze_1(i, cv, msi, cv.ctd_[0]);
6466  }
6467  }
6468 }
6469 
6470 double NetCvode::maxstate_analyse(Symbol* sym, double* pamax) {
6471  MaxStateItem* msi;
6472  if (mst_ && mst_->find(msi, (void*)sym)) {
6473  *pamax = msi->amax_;
6474  return msi->max_;
6475  }
6476  *pamax = -1e9;
6477  return -1e9;
6478 }
6479 
6480 void NetCvode::recalc_ptrs() {
6481 #if CACHEVEC
6482  // update PlayRecord pointers to v
6483  int i, cnt = prl_->count();
6484  for (i=0; i < cnt; ++i) {
6485  PlayRecord* pr = prl_->item(i);
6486  if (pr->pd_) {
6487  pr->update_ptr(nrn_recalc_ptr(pr->pd_));
6488  }
6489  }
6490  // update PreSyn pointers to v
6491  hoc_Item* q;
6492  if (psl_) ITERATE(q, psl_) {
6493  PreSyn* ps = (PreSyn*)VOIDITM(q);
6494  if (ps->thvar_) {
6495  double* pd = nrn_recalc_ptr(ps->thvar_);
6496  if (pd != ps->thvar_) {
6497  pst_->remove(ps->thvar_);
6498  pst_->insert(pd, ps);
6499  ps->update_ptr(pd);
6500  }
6501  }
6502  }
6503 #endif
6504 }
6505 
6506 static double lvardt_tout_;
6507 
6508 static void* lvardt_integrate(NrnThread* nt) {
6509  size_t err = NVI_SUCCESS;
6510  int id = nt->id;
6511  NetCvode* nc = net_cvode_instance;
6512  NetCvodeThreadData& p = nc->p[id];
6513  TQueue* tq = p.tq_;
6514  TQueue* tqe = p.tqe_;
6515  double tout = lvardt_tout_;
6516  nt->_stop_stepping = 0;
6517  while (tq->least_t() < tout || tqe->least_t() <= tout) {
6518  err = nc->local_microstep(nt);
6519  if (nt->_stop_stepping) {
6520  nt->_stop_stepping = 0;
6521  return (void*)err;
6522  }
6523  if (err != NVI_SUCCESS || stoprun) { return (void*)err; }
6524  }
6525  int n = p.nlcv_;
6526  Cvode* lcv = p.lcv_;
6527  if (n) for (int i=0; i < n; ++i) {
6528  nc->retreat(tout, lcv + i);
6529  lcv[i].record_continuous();
6530  }else{
6531  nt->_t = tout;
6532  }
6533  return (void*)err;
6534 }
6535 
6536 int NetCvode::solve_when_threads(double tout) {
6537  int err = NVI_SUCCESS;
6538  int tid;
6539  double til;
6540  nrn_use_busywait(1); // just a possibility
6541  if (empty_) {
6542  if (tout >= 0.) {
6543  while (nt_t < tout && !stoprun) {
6544  deliver_events_when_threads(tout);
6545  if (nrn_allthread_handle) { (*nrn_allthread_handle)(); }
6546  }
6547  if (stoprun==0) {
6548  nt_t = tout;
6549  }
6550  } else {
6551 
6552  if ((til = allthread_least_t(tid)) < 1e10) {
6553  deliver_events_when_threads(til);
6554  }else{
6555  nt_t += 1e6;
6556  }
6557  if (nrn_allthread_handle) { (*nrn_allthread_handle)(); }
6558  }
6559  }else if (gcv_) {
6560  if (tout >= 0.) {
6561  while (gcv_->t_ < tout || allthread_least_t(tid) < tout) {
6562  err = global_microstep_when_threads();
6563  if (nrn_allthread_handle) { (*nrn_allthread_handle)(); }
6564  if (err != NVI_SUCCESS || stoprun) { return err; }
6565  }
6566  retreat(tout, gcv_);
6567  gcv_->record_continuous();
6568  } else {
6569  // advance or initialized
6570  double tc = gcv_->t_;
6571  initialized_ = false;
6572  while (gcv_->t_ <= tc && !initialized_) {
6573  err = global_microstep_when_threads();
6574  if (nrn_allthread_handle) { (*nrn_allthread_handle)(); }
6575  if (err != NVI_SUCCESS || stoprun) { return err; }
6576  }
6577  }
6578  }else{ // lvardt
6579  if (tout >= 0.) {
6580  // Each thread could integrate independently to tout
6581  // as long as no thread got more than
6582  // a minimum delay interval ahead of any other.
6583  // For now just integrate by min delay intervals.
6584  lvardt_tout_ = tout;
6585  while(nt_t < tout) {
6586  nrn_multithread_job(lvardt_integrate);
6587  if (nrn_allthread_handle) { (*nrn_allthread_handle)(); }
6588  if (err != NVI_SUCCESS || stoprun) { return err; }
6589  int tid;
6590  allthread_least_t(tid);
6591  }
6592  }else{
6593  // nthread>1 is more or less purposeless if we mean
6594  // that only the least cvode of all threads advances.
6595  // (which is required if minimum delay = 0)
6596  if (nrn_nthread > 1) {
6597 hoc_execerror("Lvardt method from fadvance()", "presently limited to single thread.");
6598  }
6599  }
6600  }
6601  nrn_use_busywait(0);
6602  t = nt_t;
6603  dt = nt_dt;
6604  return err;
6605 }
6606 
6607 static void* deliver_for_thread(NrnThread* nt) {
6608  NetCvode* nc = net_cvode_instance;
6609  NetCvodeThreadData& d = nc->p[nt->id];
6610  TQItem* q = d.tqe_->least();
6611  DiscreteEvent* de = (DiscreteEvent*)q->data_;
6612  double tt = q->t_;
6613  d.tqe_->remove(q);
6614 #if PRINT_EVENT
6615  if (nc->print_event_) { de->pr("deliver", tt, nc); }
6616 #endif
6617  de->deliver(tt, nc, nt);
6618  return 0;
6619 }
6620 
6621 void NetCvode::deliver_events_when_threads(double til) {
6622 //printf("deliver_events til %20.15g\n", til);
6623  int tid;
6624  while(allthread_least_t(tid) <= til) {
6625  STATISTICS(deliver_cnt_);
6626  nrn_onethread_job(tid, deliver_for_thread);
6627  if (stoprun || nrn_allthread_handle) { return; }
6628  }
6629 }
6630 
6631 int NetCvode::global_microstep_when_threads() {
6632  int err = NVI_SUCCESS;
6633  int tid;
6634  double tt = allthread_least_t(tid);
6635  double tdiff = tt - gcv_->t_;
6636  if (tdiff <= 0) {
6637  // since events do not internally retreat with the
6638  // global step, we should already be at the event time
6639  // if this is too strict, we could use eps(list_->t_).
6640 //if (tdiff != 0.0) { printf("tdiff=%g\n", tdiff); }
6641  assert(tdiff == 0.0 || ( gcv_->tstop_begin_ <= tt && tt <= gcv_->tstop_end_));
6642  deliver_events_when_threads(tt);
6643  }else{
6644  err = gcv_->handle_step(this, tt);
6645  }
6646  if ((tt = allthread_least_t(tid)) < gcv_->t_) {
6647  gcv_->interpolate(tt);
6648  }
6649  return err;
6650 }
6651 
6652 void* nrn_interthread_enqueue(NrnThread* nt) {
6653  net_cvode_instance->p[nt->id].enqueue(net_cvode_instance, nt);
6654  return 0;
6655 }
6656 
6657 void NetCvode::set_enqueueing() {
6658  MUTLOCK
6659  enqueueing_ = 1;
6660  MUTUNLOCK
6661 }
6662 
6663 double NetCvode::allthread_least_t(int& tid) {
6664  // reduce (take minimum) of p[i].tqe_->least_t()
6665  double tt, min = 1e50;
6666 // setting enqueueing_ in interthread_send was a race. Logically it is not
6667 // needed. It is not clear if higher performance would result in having
6668 // a MUTEX for the NetCvode instance but that is the current implementation
6669 // instead of commenting out the enqueuing related lines.
6670  if (enqueueing_) {
6671  nrn_multithread_job(nrn_interthread_enqueue);
6672  enqueueing_ = 0;
6673  }
6674  for (int id = 0; id < pcnt_; ++id) {
6675  tt = p[id].tqe_->least_t();
6676  if (tt < min) { tid = id; min = tt; }
6677  }
6678  return min;
6679 }
